1a1('bum): e ma he/ dkon mchog gong du mched pa'i dpel/ spyi n+yag nor bu rin bzhin// bcom med par yid ches la/ nam yang brjod pa med par mdzad
1a2('bum): bla mchod mkhas btsur sen pa'i dpel/ bzhin nu na pabangs dang ldan bzhin/ 'di dang byin ma'i don yong la/ rab tu 'bral ba med par mdzad
1a2('bum): sbyin pa phyogs med rtong pa'i dpe'/ khyim bdag 'gon med zas sbyin bzhin// bzang ngan med par yid ches la/ dmigs med sngobs rgyas thob mdzod
1a4('bum): zhang blo spyod pa bzang po'i dpe' / mi dpon byang chub sems dpa' bzhin thugs skyed bzang po bong mdzad la/ mi sde mtha' nas skyongs par mdzod
1a5('bum): bya ba las stabs mdzad pa'i dpel mon gyi bdag po kra 'bum bzhin / thugs dam khyad 'phags bzhengs pal/ snyan pas phyogs bcur khyab par mdzod/ 
1a6('bum): bla ba phyogs pang dang ba nayon gyi bdag po 'bum len pa kun pa snyoms par yang pa la/ dmigs med bsngo ba rgyas
1b1('bum): kyims mas rgyang ba sranakun gyi ming du 'ang byarang 'byong snying po yongs par mdza
1b2('bum): sa nga spo 'as macanam bya rna bya mam ba yangs mas yang masas du yangs kyi gas zugs par grang
1b[1]1('bum): yo 'ams ma lasam la/ bya ma byamar ba 'a ga sas ya ma pa'i ga sa ma byus gdas gas gnyis par tha dang/ 
2a1('bum): du/ pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu gsum pa/ dam
2a2('bum): po dang po// / rab 'byor gzhad yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab tu
2a3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ gal de gzugs yong su ma rdzogs so// zhes bya bar mi spyod na// shes
2a4('bum): phaphyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa yongasu ma rdzog
2a5('bum): so// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la smod do/ gal de skye mched dang khams dang rjen
2b1('bum): cong 'brel par 'byung ba yongs ma rdzogs/ zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ pha rol du phyin
2b2('bum): pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'i
2b3('bum): spyod do// dran pa nye bar bzha ga pa rnams yongasu mi rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2b4('bum): po la spyod do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnaMs dang / stobs rnams
2b5('bum): dang / bang chub kyi yam yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong su ma rdzog so// zhes bya bar
3a1('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
3a2('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas hUM
3a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs pa rdzogaso / 
3a4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo drarnam
3a5('bum): yongs ma rdzogs// zhes bya bar mi spod na/ sheso rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod do/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
3b1('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje rnon po dang / sangs
3b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yong su ma rdzogs so// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
3b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa po nyid kyi bar du ma rdzogaso// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga
3b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ma nga su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// zhes bya bar mi spyo
3b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang sa'ang byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs pa gas
4a1('bum): yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ zhes bya ba de ltar mi spyod na du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong
4a2('bum): dro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yengs ma rdzogasre ba gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
4a3('bum): yin no/ zhes bya ba de ltar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de
4a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu
4a5('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags par bstan pa 'di mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ rab
4b1('bum): dri bzhin no// rab 'byor de da basbyin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chu
4b2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la de chugasu pa dang / mchags pa med par logs par bskon to/ 
4b3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags
4b4('bum): pa'o ma ma chags pa'am zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la s+thi / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
4b5('bum): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
4b6('bum): ga lang skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ma chags pa'am/ chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kying
5a1('bum): du phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am/ mchags pa 'am zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
5a2('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
5a3('bum): byas ma gdon gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
5a4('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rlung spyod pa nyid chags pa 'am mo chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi
5a5('bum): spyod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
5a6('bum): po la spyod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bden chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
5b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
5b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
5b3('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ mnags pa'am zhes bya bar mi spyodan
5b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang sa gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / chags pa 'amam chags pa zhes
5b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
5b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byamos pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad chags
6a1('bum): pa'am mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
6a2('bum): kyi bar du chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems
6a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyodan/ gzugs pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shi sa dang / 'du
6a4('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes po med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel pa
6a5('bum): 'byung gu/ chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / bya
6a6('bum): ba kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu bdun chags pa 'amam chags pa zhes bya ba ro 'du shes pa med do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
6b1('bum): bsam glatan nas dang / chud myed rnam s+yA nga / gzugs myed pa'i sems pa 'jug pa rnams da/ rnam par gyur ba brgyad da
6b2('bum): gnas pa'i rnangs pa'i dzun pa seM na na nga na
6b3('bum): ma tshugs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes dri med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
6b4('bum): med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sa yang dag par rig po bzhi dang / byams
6b5('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad chags pa 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes du mod / 
6b6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i bras bu rmugs pa'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dpe/ phyir mi 'ong ba
6b7('bum): 'bras dri dang / dgra bcom po nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang byang chub chags pa'am mtshogs pa zhes
7a1('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bla na mong pa yang dag par rdzogs de'i byang chub chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
7a2('bum): pa med do/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grog/ ma bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi
7a3('bum): 'phel ma bstan kyang myi 'phel ba ngo mtshar to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de bzhin te/ chos zab mo
7a4('bum): bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib ma bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'drelo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dperan
7a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs d+ma'i sangs rgyas rnam mtsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / namakha'i legs pa'as ma 'a
7a6('bum): pa brjod kyang / namakha' ni legs par brjod pas yingasu 'grib pa med do// nyes pa brjod pas yong su 'grib pa med do// rna mkha' ni legs pa
7a7('bum): brjed kying / 'phel ba med do/ nyes pa brjid kyang 'phel ba med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs par brjod kyang
7b1('bum): 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'grib du med do/ legs pa brjod kyang / chags par 'gyur ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang khong 'khro bar 'gyurab/ 
7b2('bum): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
7b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang
7b4('bum): go yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri brlon parabyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
7b5('bum): chub las slar mi ldog pa ni/ dka' bar bgyid pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpo nam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7b6('bum): rnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni na mkha' sgom pa ste/ na mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byedapa
7b7('bum): rnam por shes pa mi mchis si/ na mkha' la ni skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchis so// na mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
8a1('bum): rol du phyin pa dang / sa rab kyi rol du ni pa mchis sa/ na ma lani nang slong ba mamachi rjes dngas de meng po
8a2('bum): nam pa'i ldan dran pa nye bar ba zhig pa rnam sa ma mchis so// yang dag par phreng banas dge / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / slebs rnams da
8a3('bum): byang rgyud kyi yan lagarnams dang / 'phags ni lam ldan lag rgyud pa ma mchis de las// nam/ la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam/ 
8a4('bum): godan rnams dang / rgyad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa nas dang / rnam par tha pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas dra'i snyoms par
8a5('bum): du byung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mamachis so// rnam la bar la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams da
8a6('bum): kyai rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgribs bcu de/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang seM sa yang dag par rig pa ban dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
8b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma mchis so// na mkha' ldani rgyun du bzhugasa'i 'bras du ma mchi so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras/ 
8b2('bum): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ma man+ta so// na mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man+ti so// bcom ldan 'dres byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b3('bum): dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal bya de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go tshwa 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha'i don du brtson drar mos/ 'bad par
8b4('bum): par mos/ brtsol bar mos bdag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' yongasu smin par 'tshal zhing yongasu grol bar 'tshal bya'o// 
8b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du dgo/ cha 'chil ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom
8b6('bum): ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ na mkha'i bar snang la brdeg par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
8b7('bum): gang sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtsoni 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/ 
8b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po dgos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems/ 
9a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi s+yAd du/ blun mung pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub du ngon par rdzog sa par 'dzud brgyu
9a2('bum): 'tshal ba de dag ni dpa' bo tsam gyis mi khyab pa 'tshungs pa mi mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ga 'di stong gsum gyi snod chen po'i 'dzag
9a3('bum): rten gyi khams 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ du 'am shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal la me/ 'bras kyi shing ngam/ til gyi shing bzhin du / 
9a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongasu gang bar gyur pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal par 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ 
9a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang bcom ldan 'das can gyi khams la dri ba 'am gang ba mi gda'o// 
9a6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dbyin pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga
9a7('bum): klung gi bye mo snyed dag na 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu rim shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshul lam/ 'bras kyi shring dram/ dril gyi shing
9a8('bum): bzhin du de bzhini gshegs pa mang pos yongs gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
9b1('bum): pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ drangs ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ gang ba mi bda'o// de ci'i slad du she na/ sems// 
9b2('bum): can ma mchis dang / sems can dbyin pa'i slad du/ zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam drangs des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can gyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
9b3('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'tshal de dag ni na mkha' yongasu smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing sdong su dgrol bar 'tshul/ ba lags zhes 'che'i'o// de nas dge slong gcig gcig 'di skam
9b4('bum): du gyur de/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam pa/ 
9b5('bum): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod// 
9b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dren dkon
9b7('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
9b8('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yang ni/ de dgang la brtson par bye/ 
10a1('bum): byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems dpa' de ni na mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas// 
10a2('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
10a3('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la bdag gisuM srung ba dang / sbyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
10a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ke'u shi ko khyod kyis gang gasrung ba dang / skyang ba dang / skyab par bya ba'i
10a5('bum): chos de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ smras po btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la srung ba dang sbyang ba dang skyab pa dang bya bo'i chos de lta bu yang dag pa
10a6('bum): rje su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shI ka ga la te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ de nyid de'i srung ba dang sbyang / 
10a7('bum): ba ded / skyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar gyur na/ de la mi 'am ci'i mi mu yin pas klags tshil bA rnams kyis klags rnyed par 'gyur/ 
10a8('bum): gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas par rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub
10b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams srung ba dang / sbyang ba dang / skyab par gang sems pa de ni na mkha' la srung ba dang / sbyang ba dang / sgrub par sos/ 
10b2('bum): ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i bskal pa tsan du 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du srems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang sgra brnyan dang / migo yor dang
10b3('bum): sprul pa srung ba dang / sbyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab byor de ni mi nus so/ smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
10b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa rnams srung bar dang / sbyang ba dang / skyab pa gang sems pa don bsam pa ltar mi'i grub cing dub pa'i bskal po can du 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du
10b5('bum): sems/ khyed kyis de bzhi ni gshegs pa 'am de/ bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la srung ba dang / skyab pa nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa de btsun pa rab 'byor de/ 
10b6('bum): ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams srungs pa dang / sbyang ba dang / bskyab pa dang / gang sems pa
10b7('bum): de ni bsam pa lngar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis
10b8('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / skyob por na sa ma/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mo ni so// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'/ 
11a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par snang ba dang / bskyang ba dang sgrub par sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing drub pa'i brda skal bcan du
11a2('bum): 'gyu ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// bcom ldan 'das btsun pa rab 'byor ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shis
11a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu 'i chu'i chos rnas yongasu shes
11a4('bum): pa dang / de ltar yong su shes pas shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i ma rlom sems lnga su mi byed mi lam gyis rlom sem su mi byed/ rmi la mo la rlom sems mi
11a5('bum): byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sem su mi byed/ sbrul pas rlom semasu mi byed/ sbrul pa la rlom su mi byed pa yin/ gzugs kyis rlom su mi byed den pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis
11a6('bum): smras pa/ ke'u shI ka ga la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom semasu mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom byed/ gzugs
11a7('bum): li rlom semasasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam la rlomam semasu mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu ming byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sem su mi byed/ sprul pas
11a8('bum): semasu mi byed/ sgrol ba la rlom sems mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sem su mi byed/ rnam pa
11a9('bum): khye gyis smras pa 'acu shi ga gal ma byang rgya semam ma tsham tsham
11b1('bum): shes pa la rlom sem su mi byed na/ de rmi la rims su mi byed/ mi lam gyis rlom sem su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rjesam su mi byed/ sprul bas sem su byed sprul pa la rloms su ma
11b2('bum): byed do// skye mched drug dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sem su ma byed/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas rlom semasu m-i byed/ ni/ rmi lo ma ma sems mi byed
11b3('bum): lom gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems mi byed do// sprul pa'i bair du mi byed/ sprul pas rlom so su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems mi byed do// bre la du phyin pa thams
11b4('bum): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsi bdun la rlom sem su mi byed byang chub kyi phyogros bkyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rlom sem su m-i byung / byang chub kyi
11b5('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rlom sem su mi byed na/ do rmi lam rlom sem su mi byed na/ rmi lam gyis rlom semasu mi byed rmi lam la rlom sem su mi byed do// sprul ba'i bar
11b6('bum): dri rlom sem su mi byung / sprul pas rlom sems mi byed do// sprul pa la rlom semasu mi byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gangan rnams das de med pa rnams dang / 
11b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / spong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa me/ 
11b8('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom semasu mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom semasu mi byed// mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom semasu mi byed ni/ de rmi lam la rnam
12a1('bum): semasu mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pas rlom semasu mi byed do// sprul pa la rlo
12a2('bum): sem su mi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rlom sems mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sa
12a3('bum): su mi byed do// de rmi lam rlom sems mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom semasu mi byed do// sprul pas rlom semasasu mi byed do// sprul
12a4('bum): lo rlom semasu ma byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
12a5('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rlom sems mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyis rlom semasu mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam
12a6('bum): rlom semasu mi byed na rmi lam gyis rlo ma sem su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlomu semasu mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pas rlom semasu mi byed do// sbrul pu laM rlom semasu mi
12a7('bum): mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom semasu mi byed rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lus su mi byed na/ 
12a8('bum): rmi lam rlom semasu mi byed rmi lam gyis rlom sem su mi byed/ rmi lim lam la rlom semasu mi byed do// sprul ba'i bar du rlo mi sem su ma byed/ sprul par rlomi semasu mi byed/ sprul pa la
12b1('bum): semasu mi byed do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'tshem
12b2('bum): dang / dga'i ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / bzhin 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lnga nye pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas rtsang ma'i ris
12b3('bum): kyi lha'i bu/ gang ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rjes kyi tsin gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das lha mthor cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
12b4('bum): kyi zhi ba sa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas rgyal po bzhi dang / lce'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas rtsang me'i ris kyi
12b5('bum): bar kyi lha'i rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus / shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'dri nyid kyis chos ston pa'i man+ta 'di nyid mnga' ba dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag
12b6('bum): gris/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de dag lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di
12b7('bum): nyid zhu zhing / yongasu dri ba'i sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// lho dang chub dang / byang chub dang byang shar dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / yang sangs rgyasan
12b8('bum): yi ge 'di nyid kyis stong pa/ mtshan nyid mnga' ban dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang
13a1('bum): de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongasu dri ba'i sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
13a2('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yangs phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
13a3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid skyon cing / 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dag
13a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par
13a5('bum): sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par gyur to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / brtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub ste
13a6('bum): dnga' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston cing 'chang por 'gyuraro// 
13a7('bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
13a8('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar sa ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzu/ 
13b1('bum): bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
13b2('bum): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs cings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am
13b3('bum): ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston pa
13b4('bum): mi 'gyuraro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i ma/ bdag zhes bya ba'om/ bdag med ces bya bA ma/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug/ 
13b5('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam par shes po zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar kau chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dong grol zhes bya da
13b6('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'odzes zhes bya'am/ da lngar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur// skye mched dang // khams dang / rton cing 'brel bar 'byung
13b7('bum): nag ces bya ba'am ma rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rkyen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos smin par mi 'gyur// rten cing 'bral ba bdag
13b8('bum): ces bya ba'om bdag med ces bya bar chos bsngon par mi 'gyuraro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi smrig ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/ 
18a1('bum): du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la sgra brnyan gyi sgra ltar na mkha'
18a2('bum): la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'i// gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
18a3('bum): 'das ji ltar na/ na mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni gang
18a4('bum): yang brjod du med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' rjed du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor bzhin yang na mkha' myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
18a5('bum): rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa logs/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha'i dmigasasu ma mchis po'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu dag pa las
18a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byoranam mkha' le gang yid med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmig su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dang/ 
18a7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor bzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// 
18a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 
18b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thos cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab
18b2('bum): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'tshong ba dang / klog po dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par
18b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi 'and 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nang dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ lus ngan par mi 'gyur// rgasa'i khogs pa'i lus
18b4('bum): su mi 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba spong bas/ dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad tre du lha stong phrag mang po 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
18b5('bum): kyi lha rnams dang / gnas rtsang ma'i khyar bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyuraro// gang na chos sme ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
18b6('bum): 'odi ston pa der yang ches brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lnga'i tshogs mang po 'du bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sngon po'i tshe
18b7('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nas kyi phung po rab du mang ba tshad ma mchis drangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'tshungs pa mthu pa bzhal
18b8('bum): du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa rab du 'phel bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me
19a1('bum): grang ces brgyad dang / bcu pa ni dang / bcwalnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di lta'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
19a2('bum): ches mang du 'phel de/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po tshad med pa sa med drungs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'tshungs pa med pa bzhal du med pa dpag du med pa rab du 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 
19a3('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin de/ sems can dmyal ba rnams
19a4('bum): las yongs grol bar byed do/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi dbul po las yongs dril bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// / 
19a5('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho nga'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byi nai pa'o// rgyal chen zhi'i rigs che zhing mthong ba'i lhar skye bo'i skye mched
19a6('bum): 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes mid min skye mche dkyi bar gyi lhar skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun du zhugs po'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'obras
19a7('bum): bu dang / phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin po'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dre ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
19a8('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di las dge be bcu'i las kyi'i ma rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho nga'i rigs rnams thong ngo / bram ze'i rigs tshe nang mtho ba rnams yod do// 
19b1('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / bzhan
19b2('bum): 'phrul dbang byed dang kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phran dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snar
19b3('bum): dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang chung che dang / tshad med che dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che dang / mi bdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya no
19b4('bum): snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam de shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / bcung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 
19b5('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med ma ni skye mched gyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
19b6('bum): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
19b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod de/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa be den yod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'i dang / bzod pa'i pha
19b8('bum): du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// ning stong ba nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
20a1('bum): nyid kyi bar du yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
20a2('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong po dngamangon par shes pa rnams yod de/ ting nge 'dzin thams da dang / gzungs kyi sgo thos
20a3('bum): cad dang yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
20a4('bum): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal
20a5('bum): rigs che zhing mtho rnams med do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba nas yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal rgya chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lAn+da
20a6('bum): yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lnga dang / mtshe mra dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / bzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang
20a7('bum): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshud med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung nga che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 
20a8('bum): 'bras bu che ba dang / chi ba dang / mi bdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha'i yas skye mched dang / rnam par mtha' yas skye mched
20b1('bum): dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir ming
20b2('bum): brnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang byeng chub rnams yod de/ byang chub seMs dpa' rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod
20b3('bum): do// / de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am rnam par byang ba med
20b4('bum): 'am yongasu bzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ de ni 'di ltar gang la skye ba 'am 'ag gra po 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par rnam byang ba 'am/ yongasu bzung
20b5('bum): ba 'am/ der bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// ro ba 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'i mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
20b6('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gapa yang dmig su med de/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de
20b7('bum): la ni/ dmigasu med do// rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni chos gang gis kyang 'gro ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar gang glo bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmi go su med do// rab 'byor
20b8('bum): de'i phyir na pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni chos mgo ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod gi
21a1('bum): 'itshe/ de ltar 'du shes par mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
21a2('bum): du phyin pa sgom po// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa nyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams zhing / sangs rgya so bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gro bya
21a3('bum): ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / bsti bsdad du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ seMs can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong
21a4('bum): su sbyang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa rnams su
21a5('bum): yong su ston pa'i/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba med pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'i
21a6('bum): 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ de lngar byung ba d+ma med do// rab 'byor de ltar no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'das par byed ma yin/ gnas
21a7('bum): par byed pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa mo yin/ sbyin pa'i
21a8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
21b1('bum): tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma lags/ mdor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub
21b2('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
21b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dir ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa sgom pa dang / mngon par
21b4('bum): shes pa rnams sgrub pa me yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams smra ba ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
21b5('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa rnams sgrubs pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin
21b6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa lpags/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba yin/ byang
21b7('bum): nub sgrub pa ma yin 'dor bI mi yin/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba mi yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
21b8('bum): phyin pa 'di ni 'dus rgyas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ rang bar ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chetshes
22a1('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par
22a2('bum): sangs rgya so// mngon par thugasu chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to/ brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// bsal
22a3('bum): bar 'arjod do// yang dag pa'i bsten to// de nas lnga'i bu stong phrag mang po stong gi bar snang lnga 'khod nas lhung lding ldeg ldeg gi sgra byung nas lha rdzas kyi ma tog ud pal dang / bad mo dang / kr-i mu tra dang / 
22a4('bum): pun d+ha ri ka dang / man d+ha rA ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen bo/ 'thor zhing / 'di srid kyi tshig kyang brjod par 'gyur de/ kye m-i hA/ rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bstan pa'i lha'i bu stong
22a5('bum): du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skye bar gyur te// 'dzu bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis skor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyiso gnas rtan rab 'byor la bka'i stsal pa/ 
22a6('bum): rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis skor ba yang ma yin/ gcig du skor ba yang ma yin ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang
22a7('bum): 'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i snyir
22a8('bum): du pa ma gnas pa'i dzim ma thong pa nyid dgang lags/ bcom ldan 'dis kyis paka' phrul po rab 'byor shes rab kyi ro khyen pa shes bkyi tshel du phyin
22b1('bum): ngo/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus rol du byin dang / bzo nga pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pa rol du byin bu dang / sbyin pa'i ba rol du phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
22b2('bum): phyin pas spong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nung stong pa nyid kyis spong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis spong de nyid// dran pa 'i bar ba zhag pa rnams
22b3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nA dang dbang po rnam dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ni// 'phags pa'i
22b4('bum): yan lag rgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang / mthar byas
22b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni med na par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / 
22b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nas ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byas sa pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
22b7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bcwo rgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i bras bus spong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
22b8('bum): dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / dgra bcom pa nyid/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis stong / 
23a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skad rnyed pa rol
23a2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni mo ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis steng ngo // de ni ches thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis sdong // byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po rnaMs kyang shes
23a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya la/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma mchis/ chos kyi
23a4('bum): 'khor lo bskor la/ rjes gang yang 'khor 'am mi 'khor ra ba 'am/ rab du 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gang yang yongasu 'thong ba 'am/ yongasu mi mthong ba ma mchis so// 
23a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lhur gang 'khor bar dgyi dra ba 'am/ rab du mi 'khor bur bgyid pa'i slad du/ de lta bu ma mchis/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du
23a6('bum): mngon par ma grub po/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lag so// mtshan ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor ba
23a7('bum): bgyid pa ma lagaso// smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lag so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rab tu bstan pa dang / sgrub pa dang / rab 'khod
23a8('bum): pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / stong pa nyi dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pas
23b1('bum): yongasu dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sud kyang mazung ngo // gang sus sa kyang ma bstan pa de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ gang sus kyang mngon du/ 
23b2('bum): ma bgyis pa de la ni yongasasu mya ngan las 'das pa ma mtshas te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni gang su yang sbyin pa'i gan su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol
23b3('bum): du byin pa snong drug ny-i shu lA~M pa las/ le'u shu brgyad pa'o// ban+d+ha de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
23b4('bum): yi 'di skad ces ga sa b+h+yo // bcom ldan 'das 'diste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mAmachi sa ba'i la rol du phyin pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis byaka'i stsal
23b5('bum): namA 'a med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'byer ces thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gres la ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
23b6('bum): 'di ni rnam par dben d+ma'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bu/ mtha' las 'das baspyong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsong pa bcom ldan 'das 'dri b+ha ste/ sheso rab kyi/ 
23b7('bum): ga tu ston pa 'di ni thub pa ma mdzes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcos ldan 'das kyis duka/ 'phrul pa/ rang 'byir chos thams cad dmyig su med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
23b8('bum): 'dis s+ho/ shes rab kyi ro duphyin pa 'di ni gzhis pamam sa nga'i nga ris du phyin pa'o// badzin ldan 'das byos pa// 'gyur ba/ mi da sus ma ngo d+hin/ 'al pa sa rje
23b9('bum): shes ra gyi ba ma phyin pa namam nyid kyi rgyan po chom rnam nas kyi
24a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma 'di ni na mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa ba
24a2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dmigs
24a3('bum): med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tsher
24a4('bum): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa da gsu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma
24a5('bum): mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni
24a6('bum): nimi 'phrogs pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad zung du med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
24a7('bum): pa 'di ni skad cig ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ga' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha ru
24a8('bum): dbyin pa 'dini skyebs chis pa'i ba rel du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gog pa mang ba'i phyir ro// gsel ba bcom ldan das 'dzin ni
24b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// bsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
24b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes pa pa ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmig suM med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
24b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyisas ka' stsal pa/ skye dang 'chi ba dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes/ 
24b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di
24b5('bum): lha ste shes babri kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rna lamA lnga bugyi pA rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rmi laM mthob dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
24b6('bum): 'dis 'di lta sde shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra brnyan pa dang skye
24b7('bum): brjod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ani ni mig yor gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel ba/ me long gi
24b8('bum): bzhin dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bas
25a1('bum): pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol ma'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
25a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
25a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun po dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa
25a4('bum): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ste/ shes
25a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis bI pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyin mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan
25a6('bum): 'das 'dri lnga sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ri dmigasu med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas shing mig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
25a7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// 
25a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems mi mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag
25b1('bum): khar bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings
25b2('bum): gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
25b3('bum): stsal pa chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ gcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas
25b4('bum): ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
25b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thos cang mtshon ma med cing dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom
25b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chagra ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'dod chags dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
25b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang gis mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir
25b8('bum): ro// gsil ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes
26a1('bum): mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
26a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yong su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin
26a3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab du spangs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
26a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyisu mi 'gyur
26a5('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i sprul pa/ mtha' las rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ 
26a6('bum): tha mi dad pa'i pha ril du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thams cad ma 'dres bu'i phyir/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
26a7('bum): nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyen thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las mda' bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan / 
26a8('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa'i nga'i la tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nom par rtog pa thams cad da da mig su meng pa
26b1('bum): phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi chang
26b2('bum): dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ni na mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams/ 
26b3('bum): cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
26b4('bum): chos thams cad la 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha la phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
26b5('bum): stsal pa/ chos thams cad tsher bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir du byamar ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
26b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sbyong pa nyid/ 
26b7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin
26b8('bum): ba 'di ni chan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
27a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba
27a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigasu mang ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa
27a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir
27a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmig
27a5('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
27a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dmigs med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'dras
27a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ drin dam pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi la du phyin pa 'di ma 'dus pa sa stong ba nyid kyi pha rol tu b+h+yon
27a8('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol dubyin pa di ni 'dus
27b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas spyong pa nyid nga mig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyin
27b2('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma 'thar las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal bya/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa
27b3('bum): bcom ldan 'dasas pa/ 'di lta smre shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 'di ni thog mra dang the med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma
27b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dmigs med pa'i phyir ro// gsil ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shwa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid da kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'dras
27b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
27b6('bum): du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
27b7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad/ kyi phapha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
27b8('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nI ring gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid ben pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba
28a1('bum): mas ma ma rgya kyi mam ldan sa kyi tshul pa ni rigs pa da dpe pa'i phyi sa ma ma sa ma
28a2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med
28a3('bum): pa'i chos kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
28a4('bum): chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
28a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
28a6('bum): ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos migasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
28a7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmig su meng
28a8('bum): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul
28a9('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang lnga'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga/ 
28b1('bum): skal pa/ dbang po lnga dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la sgo ni stobs lnga'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
28b2('bum): rtsol ba/ stobs lnga dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
28b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gau sa pa pha rol tu phyin
28b4('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs med pa'i phyir/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong
28b5('bum): pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
28b6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi bo'i rnam pa drimig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
28b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
28b8('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
29a1('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
29a2('bum): stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmig su med pa'i phyir/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom
29a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa dmigasu med pa'i tshul dums phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
29a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
29a6('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
29a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bku'i stsal pa// gsum gtan 'khrug pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro/ 
29a8('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab deng shes ra
29b1('bum): 'tshal pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
29b2('bum): chos thams cad thub pa'i phyir/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maM/ 
29b3('bum): gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag pa bzhi ldi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
29b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa'i dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying
29b5('bum): rje chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can yong su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas
29b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sa cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
29b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol
29b8('bum): pabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang 'byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro// gsol
30a1('bum): kyi rgyalal la sem kur byas sa shrI rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sos can gang gi rnal du
30a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ she rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
30a3('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba las le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas
30a4('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byon 'di snyam du sams rab gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i tshul
30a5('bum): skyed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du drag pa de ni dge ba'i bshis gnyen na gyis yongasu bzung ba'o// gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid/ 
30a6('bum): drung / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan dan dri byed pa lha ci skyes/ rigs
30a7('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdung sgeg par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
30a8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs dris so// yongasu zhus so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang
30a9('bum): skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin pa dang 'tshang ba dang / klog pa cing / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
30b1('bum): pa'o// tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / gladan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do sde pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
30b2('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
30b3('bum): cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du byed pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar bzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes
30b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zang ste/ sngon gyi pha rol du phyin pa drug lam spyad pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos pa bgyi bar ma nus so// bcom ldan 'das
30b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ spang ba sems pa de dag gi sbyin gyi mtha' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spangs par
30b6('bum): gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe nI/ rje 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe/ drang pa dang mos pa dang ma mchis pa'i slad du sto
30b7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phan pa sngon gyi mtha' yang // bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams la
30b8('bum): snyen bkur bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lan ji ltar skyed par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
31a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
31a2('bum): nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / 
31a3('bum): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnam
31a4('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan mu med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ 
31a5('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar sgrim par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
31a6('bum): la bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongasu ma zhus yongasu ma bris so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
31a7('bum): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa di'i buM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di snyan pa'i cha
31a8('bum): sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lte ngo mchir kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims spyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
31b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
31b2('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snying pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 
31b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa drang smon pa med pa dang / 
31b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
31b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lnga ngo mtshar kyang che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga phyag 'tshal
31b6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal zab de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin na
31b7('bum): ke'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ gong shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshalo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas
31b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brjod do// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
32a1('bum): la gnas par 'dod du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par
32a2('bum): 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi
32a3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par 'dod par dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
32a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la bkod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dkod par 'dod pa'i ri sa kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos
32a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// 
32a6('bum): khams gsum gyi phul du gyur par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bdud thams cad pham par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am riH
32a7('bum): kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pas/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsnyen par bya'o// 
32a8('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab/ 
32b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
32b2('bum): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i
32b3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brasam gdan gyi pha rol du
32b4('bum): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la/ 
32b5('bum): brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / 
32b6('bum): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
32b7('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 
32b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
33a1('bum): brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
33a2('bum): rgyas la don 'di 'gri bar soso pa legaso legaso// ke'u shi ka khyod kyi smras pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'byung ngo // ge'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/ 
33a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas pa gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par ma byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
33a4('bum): byed dung / rnam por shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yangal brtson par yang / rnam par shes pa lA brtson par byed pa yin no// mig la mi gnas
33a5('bum): gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid la mi gnas te/ gang ga'i tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par
33a6('bum): byed pa yin no// gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg drang chos la mi gnas te/ 
33a7('bum): gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gan so// mig gi 'dus te rig pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
33a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus de reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
33b1('bum): gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// sa'i khas la
33b2('bum): mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe/ sa'i khams la mi gan ste pa de'i tshe/ sna'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
