33b3('bum): khams la mi gnas te/ glang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi
33b4('bum): gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la rtson par byed pa yin no/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang
33b5('bum): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi l-i mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la rtson par byed pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
33b6('bum): phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i chi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
33b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas de rje gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas po de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson
33b8('bum): par byed pa yin no// nang stong po nyid la mi gnas ti// rlung spong ba nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson por mi byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar lamig
34a1('bum): te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par byed pa yin no// dran pa nye bar bzhan/ 
34a2('bum): pa rnams mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// yang dag par spring ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
34a3('bum): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'bugs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam yin rig brgyad
34a4('bum): pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
34a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyomasu du 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// 
34a6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe
34a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe/ gzungs kyi
34a8('bum): sgornams lam gnas pa de'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa pa zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
34b1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi rtsam chupa gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson par byed
34b2('bum): pa yin no// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub lnga
34b3('bum): mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yi no// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pato// gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi
34b4('bum): gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs
34b5('bum): mi dmigs so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba la ba'i gzag sa ma dmigs/ bang la brdzun par bang pa sbal ba bamano par ba de lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
34b6('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmig so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmig so// gang la gnas pa byas
34b7('bum): dang / gang la brtson par bye ba de lta bu'i pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi dmig so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang // 
34b8('bum): gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bigs pa'i ba don pa rnams dang / bsam gdan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnaMs dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
35a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmig so ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung
35a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams mi dmigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
35a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mi dmigs so// rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi
35a4('bum): dmigaso/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar do mi dmigaso// rab 'byor bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ 
35a5('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed/ gang ga'i tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de'i tshe/ gzugs laM brtson par byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du
35a6('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang ga' tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// skye mched
35a7('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi'i byed de/ gang ga'i tshe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor ma 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten 'brel bar 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ 
35a8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa yin na/ pha rol tudaben pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang ga'i tshe byang chub kyi/ 
35b1('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mi 'byor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu brtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
35b2('bum): gdan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid
35b3('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtson par byed pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la/ 
35b4('bum): mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi basbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
35b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa tshe/ na po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bcwa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de// gang tshe sangs rgyas
35b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi byed de/ gang gi/ 
35b7('bum): tshe rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sos dpa' chen po
35b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig so// gzugs phyi ma'i mthar ming rigs// gzugs dbu su mi dmig so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa/ 
36a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa dbus mi dmigaso// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rten
36a2('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dbus su dmigaso// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthu
36a3('bum): mi dmigaso zho byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
36a4('bum): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
36a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthur mi dmigs so// mngon
36a6('bum): shes pa rnams dbusu mi dmig so// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus
36a7('bum): mi dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dgra par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
36a8('bum): bcwa brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa rgyad kyi phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dbus su mi dmig so// rnam pa
36b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du phyi ma'i mthu' mi dmig so/ rnam pa nyid mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigaso// de na
36b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bzab po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzab pakA/ 
36b3('bum): sha ra dwa de'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
36b4('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mchod dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin pa/ nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
36b5('bum): kha zab po/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / spong ba nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro
36b6('bum): du phyin pa zab po/ 'phrogs pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
36b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de
36b8('bum): bzhin nyid bzab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
37a1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes
37a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po/ gsol pa te bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ting dpag dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa di'i bu gzugaso rting dpag
37a3('bum): dka' ba'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjing dpag dka' ba'o// tshor ba dang // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa brjing dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bting dpag
37a4('bum): dka' ba'o// skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjing dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brting dpag dka'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams da dang / stong pa
37a5('bum): nyid thams cad dang / phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun brjing dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ brjing dpag dka'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
37a6('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang
37a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gding dpag dka'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
37a8('bum): ring dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bting dpag dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas
37b1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ting dpag dka'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha/ 
37b2('bum): rol du phyin pa bting dpeg dka'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha rA dwa di'i bu gzugs tshad
37b3('bum): med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad
37b4('bum): med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yan/ skye mchod dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// pha rol du phyin pa thams
37b5('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun tshad med pa'i phyir/ shwe rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ched med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas
37b6('bum): dang / bsam gdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthur gyis mnus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
37b7('bum): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// ro// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgra
37b8('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying
38a1('bum): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/ 
38a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
38a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du/ 
38a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnams par shes pa bzab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing
38a5('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong po nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
38a6('bum): bcu rtsa bdun zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnaMs dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
38a7('bum): par 'jug me pa' sems par 'jam pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
38a8('bum): med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes bya kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
38b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad zab ces bya ba
38b2('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// / 
38b3('bum): bam po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zad pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma smin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
38b4('bum): par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma yin no/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid
38b5('bum): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ma yin no/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 
38b6('bum): dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshod med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam por thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa
38b7('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mchen par byas pa rnams zab pa nying yang yan pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// de
38b8('bum): nge 'dzin rnams dang // gzungs kyi sgrornams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
38b9('bum): gzungs kyi sgo na kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni// 
39a1('bum): bcwa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad
39a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong pa'i tshe/ gal de gzugs bting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
39a3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bting dpag dko'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// skye mched
39a4('bum): dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bting dpag dka'o// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rol du phyin pa thams cid dang / stong pa nyid thams
39a5('bum): dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bting dpag dko'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnamaso dang / 
39a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / sbyin
39a7('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi skyed
39a8('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyichas/ 
39b1('bum): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bting dpag dka'o// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod
39b2('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// dr-i ci'i phyir zhe na/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs pa ting dpago dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du bye do dang
39b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i bting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi bding dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
39b4('bum): ma yin no// sha ra dwa di'i bu bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs tshad med do// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab tu
39b5('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ gal de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do// zhes bya bar mi spyod na// rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// skye mched dang
39b6('bum): khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
39b7('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugasu med pa'i
39b8('bum): snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
40a1('bum): pa rnams med do zhes bya bar mngon pa mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
40a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad tshad
40a3('bum): med do// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ 
40a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe no/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni
40a5('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ga nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ 
40a6('bum): kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar za ba pa/ de ltar brjing dpag dka'o// de lta ra rtogs par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
40a7('bum): pi 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du bzhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
40a8('bum): bzab mo 'ang thos nas/ 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur du mchis so// the tsom dang / nem nur 'tshal du 'chi'o// mosaM pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog
40b1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jig
40b2('bum): mi sdang sgeg par mi 'gyu ro// the tsom dang / nem nur du 'tshal bar mi 'gyur de thos nas kyang gong nas gang du mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
40b3('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa di'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pA sha ra dwa di'i bu gal de theg pa la gsal du bzhugs
40b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshed pa la nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal du theg pa la gas
40b5('bum): du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bsho da pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs
40b6('bum): ngar 'gyur/ snang bar 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur/ phyir zlog par 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyuraro// de ni mos par mi 'gyur te/ kai'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so
40b7('bum): dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas spangs pa'i phyir/ de log par lhung bar gyur pa'i las mngon par byed cing / brtsegs par 'gyur te/ las byas pa dang brtsegs
40b8('bum): pa des kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa pin
41a1('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam smras
41a2('bum): pa ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dge
41a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pacig gam gnyis las/ mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang
41a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems rba
41a5('bum): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing // thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin po dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / 
41a6('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o// sangs
41a7('bum): rgyas mang po lo snyen bkur byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i rme gsil bar bdag gis spob so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dbye'i gsal bar po dag gis spobs
41a8('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems
41b1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgoms shing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bzod pa sgrub pa
41b2('bum): dadang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa yongasasu brtong ba dang / snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi ba me de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
41b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa dang / bsam gdan la
41b4('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / bzod sgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims srungs dang / sbyin pa mo// ngasu btong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
41b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dra gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang
41b6('bum): 'dzin cing 'chang ba de bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa de dag ni yum 'in pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su 'dzin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang
41b7('bum): klog pa cing / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la 'osar bzhengs pa'o rang tsharje sems dpa' snam su dpa'am yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
41b8('bum): ba'o// sangs rgyas mngo po la snyen bkur ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
42a1('bum): chub du lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
42a2('bum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
42a3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung
42a4('bum): ba 'am/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad gnyis brgya pa'am sum brgya pa 'am/ bzhi brgya pa 'am/ lnga rgya ba nas byung ba zhig mchis la/ de byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang
42a5('bum): khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi spu lngas ba glang rdzi 'am/ phyug rdzi 'am/ sa 'tshams sam/ bza' shing gi rab phun tshogs pa'am/ nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa
42a6('bum): mthong ngam de ma b+hAzhan pa yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong brdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor na mchis pa'i snga lngas de lta bu mthong na de 'di snyam
42a7('bum): du gyur te/ spu ltas 'di dag snang ba lags na/ 'di nas drong ngam grong khyer ram/ glong brdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor ni nye'o snyam te/ dbugs byin por 'gyur zhing / de la
42a8('bum): smon cha kun pa'i 'jigs dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa'am gcin zan 'khro ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ bkres pa'am/ skem pa'i 'jigs pam mchis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
42b1('bum): sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po la gang gi'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te/ mthad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dbu kun chub par bgyid pa
42b2('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la dbyin/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ste/ ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang
42b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des slan chad nyan thos sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig par mi
42b4('bum): bgyid do// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan du mchis pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyi
42b5('bum): snga lngas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shwa ra dwa di'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis da dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa bskyed cig/ gsol pa btso
42b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho 'bying rnams chen po lta bar 'tshal nas dri brgya mtsho chen po lnga pa'i spyad du de dz+wa lnga ji ltar ba rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum du
42b7('bum): ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'amo ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong na dris 'dri nas rgya mtsho chen po thag nye ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya mtsho chen po ni dgas kyis gzhol
42b8('bum): bsri/ 'di nas rgya mo chen po'i drung dung ni ring po med do// de dang nye ban ni ldum bu'am ldum bu'i mtshani ma 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma de dag med do// zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// de ltar skyes bu de'i mig
43a1('bum): gis rgya mtsho chen po mthong du lags kyang des bdag ni rgya mtsho mdod nye bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad mi ring ngo / zhes bgyi bar rdzog
43a2('bum): par 'tshal du ma mong lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyon cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
43a3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya phrag ni
43a4('bum): 'di skad cig bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya sang phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ skal pa bye ba phrag khrig rgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
43a5('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon gsum du/ lung bstan pas da dung lung ma bstan kyis kyang / bdag ni bla med pa yang dag
43a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / nye bar gnas par lta'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo lnga ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
43a7('bum): bkur ba yod la gaunyan du yod do// thog ma nas kyang / bzung du yod/ bcang du yod klag tu yod do// kun chub par byar yod do// tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do// zhes bgyi bar rig par bya'o// bcom ldan
43a8('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dpyid kyi dus la bab ste/ rtsi shing gi lo ma dang / 'dab me lhags nas khe dog du gyur pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyis ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang me tog dang / 
43b1('bum): 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga lngas 'di dag rtsi shing lus snang ngo // zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe/ rtsi shing dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang
43b2('bum): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ ba de'i tshe yang bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo de dag gis rtsi shing gi lo ma dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag mthong nas/ nyams bde ba 'gyu ro// bcom ldan
43b3('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / snyen bkur ba dang mnyan du mchis te/ this nas kyang 'dzin
43b4('bum): cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang na tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par
43b5('bum): rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dis byang chub sems dpe sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur bgyid par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems
43b6('bum): dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / gnyen du yod pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
43b7('bum): pa la nan tan byar yod pa ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur te/ zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis
43b8('bum): pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas sngon gyi rgya la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan par 'gyur ba la sde lngas 'di dag 'byung gis// 
44a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyu ro zhes dga' zhing sgro la yid bde zhing
44a2('bum): nyams bde bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na bud med sgra mA ma ni ji lta ji ltar btsar nye ba de lta de ltar lus nyom par 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar lus nyom zhing slar shing lus ngal la rgyud
44a3('bum): bzhan cing mi dga' ba kha zas yi ger ma 'chi zhing dmugs pa dang / gi nyid chung ngu gyur te/ nyams mi bde ba des smra ba nyung bstan pa des ngang tshul ma mchis la sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la
44a4('bum): bgyid pa bsten pa dang / bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba nyong bar 'gyur/ bud med bzhin dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bcwa
44a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba leg
44a6('bum): ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa rnams la yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob mo 'di mthong par 'gyur te/ mthad par gyur
44a7('bum): nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring por mi thogs par bla na
44a8('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu leg so// leg so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs
44b1('bum): rgyas kyi mthus spongs pa skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kang drang las rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
44b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongasu bzung ba ni ngo mtshar 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
44b3('bum): lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rje ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo'i tshigs phal po'i che'i don dang / phan pa dang bang
44b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rje yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ slu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can mang po la phan 'dog ste/ 
44b5('bum): bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun par skyo ba ste/ de dag gis sems can rnaMm dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam
44b6('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug la/ bzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
44b7('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par sku 'o// bdag kyang sbyin pa yongasu gtong la/ bzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par sku lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la bzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par
44b8('bum): skul lo// bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la/ bzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skal lo// bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ bzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang bsam
45a1('bum): gtan la snyoms par 'jug la/ bzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang shes rab sgom la bzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par sku'o// de dag shes rab kyi
45a2('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / thabs 'khas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras pa la rab tu dkod kyang / bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
45a3('bum): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab du dkod kyang bdag kyang rang byang chub la mngon du byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod la/ byang
45a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cha bzhin stong phrag du ma dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
45a5('bum): byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin stong phrag du ma dag kyang tshul khrims
45a6('bum): dang / brjod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pA la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non la bzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la~M rab du 'god
45a7('bum): de/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed la// bzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bye la yang dag par skye'o// bdag kyang rangs rgyas ka tshang sems can yongasu smin par/ 
45a8('bum): byed la/ bzhan yang sems can yong su smin par bya ba la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed la/ bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pal/ 
45b1('bum): yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bzung gyi sgo yongs spyod la/ bzhan yang bzungs kyi sgo ljongasu sbyong ba la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la/ bzhan yang spobs
45b2('bum): pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang phun sum tshogs pa la yongasu 'dzin lo/ bzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par byas / byathun mang sto sa pa la yang dag par sku'o
45b3('bum): bdag kyang mtshan phun tshogs pa la yong su 'dzin la/ bzhin yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par sku 'o// bdag kyang bzhona'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yong su 'dzin la/ bzhan yang
45b4('bum): gzhana'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu bsgom la/ bzhin yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom pa la yang dag par
45b5('bum): sku la lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bas mau de gdan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i di snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
45b6('bum): mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rdza lnga bsgom la/ mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul
45b7('bum): lo// bdag kyang ti nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la bzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
45b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgrub la/ bzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgrub pa la yang
46a1('bum): mdu ga par stsal lo// bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar byed par byed la/ bzhan ma rnam pa thams sa dmakhyen pa'i tho dul yang dag par stsu'o// bdag kyang dag
46a2('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs pa la yang dgra par sku'o// bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo sker la/ bzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la yang dag pa'i skye'o// de skad ces pa/ 
46a3('bum): stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de dag sems can tham
46a4('bum): cad kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar
46a5('bum): gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ye shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
46a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dra'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba dang
46a7('bum): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom
46a8('bum): pa yoyongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
46b1('bum): ba'i 'brel ba yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje sum
46b2('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnam
46b3('bum): dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
46b4('bum): pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes mi 'thong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom yongasu rdzogs par
46b5('bum): 'gyur ro// ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phe lab yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
46b6('bum): pa sgom pa yongasu yangs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// na ma de bzhin gshegasapa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa po
46b7('bum): brgyad kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sas
46b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes bkyi
47a1('bum): rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'grib pa
47a2('bum): yang dag par rdzo sum mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
47a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// nam skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub seMs/ 
47a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yod/ su rdzogs par byed do// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su
47a5('bum): bcu rtsa bdun gyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// nam 'phags pa'i
47a6('bum): bden pa rnams dang brasam gtan rnams dang / chud med pa dus dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam por thar pa bachud dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'gyu/ 
47a7('bum): padagu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sngon pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'asgrib pa yang dag par rjes mi mthong ba de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi / 
47a8('bum): tu phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nam ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha/ 
47b1('bum): tu phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag tu rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
47b2('bum): brgyad kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms bu yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
47b3('bum): pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang
47b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ 'dra
47b5('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / ma 'ongs shes bya bar yang dag por rje su ma mthong / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar yang dge par rjes su ma mthong / dge zhes bya bar dang mi dge zhes bya ba dang
47b6('bum): lung ba ston ces bya ba dang / lung mi ston ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong // 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya ba
47b7('bum): yang dag par rje sum mthong // gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje sum mthong // gzugs medapa' sems par 'juga'i khams zhes bya bar rje su mi mthong / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes
47b8('bum): bya bar yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // tshul khrims pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chos cad dang
48a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar shes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub
48a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi tshen+da nyid dang / phyir ro ldeg
48a3('bum): pa med pa dang / gsog dang / khase ba dang / snying po med pa dang / dang du gyur pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab par bsten
48a4('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan to/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes kye dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gos mi khyab@
48a5('bum): par bstan to// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsem gyis mi khyab par ston do// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
48a6('bum): pa byasam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir rjes bka la rol bsam gyis mAM khyab par stan to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
48a7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsamAM gtan gyi pha rol du phyin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bsten to// rab 'byor nang snying po
48a8('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sa rang kyi ro 'i du bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bas
48b1('bum): gyis mi khyab par bstan to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa dun bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ gas rab para'i rgya bsam gyis mi khyab par snyan to// 'phags pa
48b2('bum): bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / ched pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis mnus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong
48b3('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan do/ ki ti ngange 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi stobs mi byas mi
48b4('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab par stan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwa
48b5('bum): brgyad bsom gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan do// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar bskum g+his mI khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyar bur stan te/ 
48b6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes ra kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs bas gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi
48b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su rdzogs
48b8('bum): par byed pa'i// byang chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal de skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces
49a1('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
49a2('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gdan rna/ 
49a3('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
49a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// gal te ting nge 'dzin
49a5('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
49a6('bum): dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag paro rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
49a7('bum): pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa/ 
49a8('bum): gsol po bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mang su zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpo'i chen
49b1('bum): po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yong su bzung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
49b2('bum): tu phyin pa zam mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// gsol po bcom ldan 'das dzId+hA tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug le spyad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
49b3('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshis gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' som
49b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi rang ban cing mi dza / mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi
49b5('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ tshor po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog na
49b6('bum): par mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rdo gro rnam par ma rtog go// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rten cing 'brel par
49b7('bum): 'byung ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'drod pa'i khamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'dod pa'i khams su
49b8('bum): mtshon mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi kham su mi rtog rnam par chog go// gzugs kyi khams kyi mtshan ma
50a1('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs me kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i kham su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ gzugs med dri
50a2('bum): khams kyi mtshan mer mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du
50a3('bum): phyin pa'i pha mtshan mar mA rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ring bzhin du mi dzeg rnam pAr mi rtog go// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
50a4('bum): du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dran par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol
50a5('bum): tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtag rnam par myi rtog go// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rlung stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// nang stong
50a6('bum): nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
50a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rdeg go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du ma jig rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub
50a8('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun du mi tshig rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi mtshan mar mi rdog rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub kyi phyog
50b1('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
50b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnamasu
50b3('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rdeg nam// ngon pa re shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams da
50b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtog rnam par mi jig go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go
50b5('bum): re bzhini gshegs pa'i sgo dang / mI 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dge bar rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi/ 'dres pa bcwa brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sangs
50b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
50b7('bum): bA nyid mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i
50b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab po/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab po/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten ci
51a1('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab po// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang / stong ba nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
51a2('bum): 'phags pa'i byeden pa rnams dang / bsam gdan dang / tshad med pa dang // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thur pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
51a3('bum): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab po// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs
51a4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
51a5('bum): nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab po// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po
51a6('bum): la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge bo'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
51a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
51a8('bum): pa zab po// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// 'phagos pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
51b1('bum): ba rnarnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang / smon pa
51b2('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// de bzhin gshegs
51b3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// rnam pa thams ca
51b4('bum): mkhyen nyid zab pa phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'i phung po'o// chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub pa'o// de ni 'di
51b5('bum): ltu ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bos ma gdan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med po'i snyoms par 'dzu grwa pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o// dran pa
51b6('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba pa ni dang / chu 'phrul byirka pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam
51b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sgrub po// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad bra bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
51b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgru
52a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgrub po// rgyun du zhugs
52a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan pacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub
52a3('bum): pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
52a4('bum): rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten/ cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa tham sa cad dag pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad dag pa dang / byang
52a5('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad mid po dang / gzu gas med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa
52a6('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag
52a7('bum): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
52a8('bum): dag pa ma dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes ba kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/ 
52b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang du byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu dang rig/ 
52b2('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhid du yid la bya zhingadra zhing sgom par bya/ ba la bar chod du mi 'gyur bar/ dri na yang myur du bri bI
52b3('bum): bya'o// glag pa dang smon pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing / sgom na yang myur du sgom mo// rab 'byor de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba
52b4('bum): gcig gis 'bri bar byas na yang / des de bzhin du 'bri bar bya'o// gal te zla baM ci gnyis bsam dang / gal te zla ba da// gsum 'am/ gal de zla ba bzhi'am/ gal te zla bi lnga 'am/ gal de zla ba
52b5('bum): drug gam/ gal te lo'o bir dri bar bya na yang / de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// ga le te zla ba ba cig gis bstan pa dang / lung 'brog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / sgoms
52b6('bum): byas na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// gal de lo'i bar gyis/ sgom par bya na yang de bzhin du sgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rin po che chen po la bar tshad mang du 'byung ngo // gso
52b7('bum): pi bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang mi 'dri ba dang / mi klag pa dang / mi bston pa dang / kha don mi bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba dang / mi sgrim pa'i srung
52b8('bum): bdud sdig can dag par chad mi dgyid pa ngo mtshor che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang mi bri ba dang / mi blag pa dang / mi stan/ 
53a1('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid pa dang / mi sgom pa'i phyir bdud sdig to can dag par chad mi byed pa yang mu min mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
53a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ngon byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bar bya bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
53a3('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bstan pa dang / kha don du
53a4('bum): bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang / sgom pa dag la bdud sdig can bgyegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/ ngon / ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas
53a5('bum): kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom pa
53a6('bum): dag la bdud sdig do can gyis ra chad bya bar mi nuso// sha ra dwa ti'i bus phyogs bcu kun du 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang
53a7('bum): chos ston pa de de dag gi mthus kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
53a8('bum): yid la byed pa dang / sbom pa de dag la/ bdud sdig te can gyi bar chad bya bar mi nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgo rje
53b1('bum): shing yong su 'dzin pa 'dzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yong su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klogs
53b2('bum): dang / ston pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nu so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa tI'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus yongs
53b3('bum): zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos yongasu btsal ba la bdud sdig do can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi
53b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag
53b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
53b6('bum): byed pa dang / sgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di zhing klo ga pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin
53b7('bum): du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klog go ston to// tshul bzhin du yid la byed de/ sbom mo zhes bya bar khong du chud pa
53b8('bum): byi'o// gsil pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa rab kyi pha rol/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dre ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha rdon
54a1('bum): bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom mo mtshal kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
54a2('bum): bka' sprul pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin de/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba
54a3('bum): dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
54a4('bum): kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'od 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha
54a5('bum): kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med drangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
54a6('bum): tshad dang / drangs ma mchis pa bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/ grang shis rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha don bgyid pa
54a7('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dog ni sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag gi spyan gyis bzig so// thugs tshud do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
54a8('bum): de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
54b1('bum): pa dang / sgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang / drangs med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs/ med pa bzhugasu shrIng
54b2('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig so// thug su chud do// / bam po// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
54b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yi du la
54b4('bum): bye ba dang / sgom pa dang / de bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / nan don byed pa de dag gis kyang 'di ltar bdag cag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nye bar gyur to// zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// 
54b5('bum): sha ra dwa di'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa nga'i rig sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes
54b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang byug dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
54b7('bum): dang rgyal tshun dang / bungan mang pos rim 'gror byed bkur stir byed/ sti stang du byed/ mchid par byed de/ de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang
54b8('bum): 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur ro/ shar dwa di'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa song sum
55a1('bum): non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
55a2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzo gos par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nim yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nang sdong ba
55a3('bum): nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dran po nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
55a4('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobla rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
55a5('bum): ro/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
55a6('bum): par 'jug pa dang / stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang rnam
55a7('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
55a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur ro/ de byang chub sems pa'i theg pa pa'i tshig
55b1('bum): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur
55b2('bum): kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nA bza' dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang rje
55b3('bum): rim 'gror byed/ bku ri sIr byed bsti sdang du byed/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngani song log por ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing
55b4('bum): pha rol du phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyuraro// de dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi 'gro dang / bkur ste
55b5('bum): dang bsti steng dang mchod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs// rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis
55b6('bum): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur// sha ra dadwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs rgyud nas yul bar da nIn spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub pa'i theg pa pa'i/ dge slong dang / dge
55b7('bum): slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen me dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ mtshang bar 'gyur/ klag par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur
55b8('bum): mi dog dang 'breng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed sdib steng du byed mi chod pa byid par 'gyur de de
56a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i bde ba phun gsum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol du phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phel bar
56a2('bum): 'gyu ro// dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang mchod par byed cing / nyan
56a3('bum): thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum po rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyu ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
56a4('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar de ni spyod pa nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud nas spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byung chub sems dpa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen
56a5('bum): ma ga la mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra bar 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin
56a6('bum): du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me dog dang / 'phreng po dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bu dran mong po su ri mi 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ s+t+rI s+t+wa
56a7('bum): du byed/ mched pa byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lba dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol du phyin pa drug gi
56a8('bum): mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ ngasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti bsdang dang / 
56b1('bum): mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum bro rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las
56b2('bum): 'du' bar 'gyuraro// sha ra dwa di'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang byang phyogs kyi rgyud na/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur
56b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni shes ra rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni gshegs pa'i dgongs
56b4('bum): nga'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro// chos de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes pa kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
56b5('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zlab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhi na du yod la byed pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan du byed pa de dag
56b6('bum): la ni nges dgongaso/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang 'am rigs kyi bu ma gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing dris nas kyang me dogra dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye
56b7('bum): ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ sku sdang du byed// mchod par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs de/ sha ra dwa di'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am
56b8('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lho dang mi'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol du phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags pa
57a1('bum): 'gyuraro// de dag pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / sti stang dang / 
57a2('bum): mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las
57a3('bum): 'das par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigasaso/ sha ra dwa di'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
57a4('bum): bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do// sha ra dI ngi'i dri rig kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ sted do sngags so/ shA rA dwa ti'i byi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
57a5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
57a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis spyan gyis zig so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs bu dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
57a7('bum): ngag gis brjod do/ snod do sngags so// gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di skad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ byang phyogasu rgyas par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das
57a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bya de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad mo'i che na/ byang phyogasu rgyas par 'gyur
57b1('bum): de/ de la sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i chen/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan par 'gyuraro// thos nas kyang mos par 'gyuraro// mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang
57b2('bum): mchung ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de bzhin du nan ngan du pyod par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
