87a1('bum): 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i seMs la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen pa legs/ ji ltar na zhe sdang dang bcas pa
87a2('bum): dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lnga bzhin du mkhyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor seMs
87a3('bum): 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems ni yang dge ba ji lta po bzhin tu dmigasu med do// sems
87a4('bum): las byung ba'i chos kyang dmigasu med na/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sas zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni// / 
87a5('bum): sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yi na no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs med de// de la sems las byung ba'i ca chos kyang dmigs
87a6('bum): su med na/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa 'am zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems dmigs pa lnga ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sems gli/ mug dang bcas pa grang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa'i
87a7('bum): lnga pa bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor seMs ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmig su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigasu med na/ gti mug dang bcas pa 'am
87a8('bum): gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten te/ sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang / 
87b1('bum): bcas pa la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen to// zhe sdang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa/ 
87b2('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen to/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
87b3('bum): bas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na tu rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems 'dod chags
87b4('bum): dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi 'dod rje chags dang bcas pa nyid ma yin no// 'dod chags dang dral ba nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing
87b5('bum): phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rang/ 
87b6('bum): du mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab du mkhyen ce na// rab 'byor sems
87b7('bum): zhe sdang dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
87b8('bum): pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang dral ba la/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas ses
88a1('bum): can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// rab 'byor sems gti mug dang bra
88a2('bum): de ni sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/ gti mug dang bral yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems gnyis 'grogs shing 'phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltan
88a3('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang brala'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// rab 'byor
88a4('bum): bzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya chen po la sems rgya che zhes bya bar
88a5('bum): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi so so// 
88a6('bum): rgya che ba la/ ses rgya che ba zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rib du mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol
88a7('bum): dang gang zag pha rol kyi sems rgya che bar mi 'gyur/ sems de rgya chung bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'grib par mi 'gyur/ sems de 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ sems
88a8('bum): de 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sems de dngos po med pas rgya che bar mi 'gyur/ rgya chung bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'grib par 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba ma
88b1('bum): yin/ 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// zhes bya bar rab du mkhyen to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar sems gung gis rgya chen por 'gyur ba 'am/ rgya chung ngur 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur/ 
88b2('bum): 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba 'am 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
88b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/ sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
88b4('bum): du rab tu mkhyen to/ rab 'byor bzhin yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten te// 
88b5('bum): sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sdes yongs pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab du mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar na dri bzhin gshegs
88b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la sems yangs
88b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang gang
88b8('bum): zag pha rol gyi sems de 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi gzig so// skye ba dang 'gag pa dang / gnas pa dang / gnas pa las bzhin du mi gzig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sos de la gang
89a1('bum): 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ gnas pa las bzhin du 'gyur ba'am/ 
89a2('bum): de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med de/ rab 'byor de lta ru de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / 
89a3('bum): gang zag pha rol gyi sems yangs pa la/ sems yangs shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen to// rab 'byor bzhin yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
89a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten te/ sems can pa ril dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang/ 
89a5('bum): drag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// rab 'phyir ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
89a6('bum): 'di lnga brten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad ces bya bar yang dgu pa dzI lta ba bzhin tu rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de/ 
89a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems gnas par yang dag par rje su mI gzigs// 
89a8('bum): rnam par gnas pa dang / yong su gnas pa dang / nye bar gnas par yang dag par rjes mi gzig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rgyud ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste/ 
89b1('bum): sems kyi rgyud de la gang na gnas par bya ba'i rten med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyis
89b2('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems tshad med pa la/ sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen to// rab 'byor
89b3('bum): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems
89b4('bum): bstan du med pa la sems bsngon du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar nau/ de bzhin grwa shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
89b5('bum): rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob mo 'di la brten te/ sems can po rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstanadu med pa la sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag
89b6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan med pa'i sems zhes
89b7('bum): bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo/ 
89b8('bum): 'di la rten te/ seMs can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems bstan du med pa la bstan du myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor bzhin yang
90a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten cing / seMs can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi seMs
90a2('bum): lhar med pa la lhar med pa'i sras shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shre dang/ 
90a3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zla ba mo 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems ltar med pa la/ lhar med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen ce na/ ra
90a4('bum): 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsamapa'i spyan lnga las sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs
90a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pa rol gyi sems ltar med pa la
90a6('bum): lngar med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ba zhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes/ 
90a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mi 'di la rten do// sems can pha rol dang / gang pha rol gyi sems khro ba dang 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang bcum pa mang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ 
90a8('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten te/ sems can po rol dang gang zag
90b1('bum): pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang 'dra ba dang / dkram pa dang / bcus pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
90b2('bum): rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du bre dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa gang ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams cad/ 
90b3('bum): kyang gzugs la rte ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyuro// zhes bya bar sems can pha rol dang / pha rol pha rol gyi seMs
90b4('bum): de dag rab du mkhyen to/ rab 'byor de ltar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten te/ spos
90b5('bum): can pha rol dang / gang pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso/ 
90b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang 'dra ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to// 
90b7('bum): bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhin gyi don med ces bya ba ni gzugs la gnas// de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// bdag dang // 
90b8('bum): 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya bar de nyid bden gyi bzhin ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// bdag
91a1('bum): dang 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhan ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
91a2('bum): dang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa logs so// bdag dang 'jig rte ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la gnas
91a3('bum): pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni 'tha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhin ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs
91a4('bum): la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shos dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten na mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin ma ldan pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden
91a5('bum): gyi bzhin ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par she pa la gnas pa'am bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa
91a6('bum): yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhan ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs pa gnas pa'o// dri ni tshe ri ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gan+da
91a7('bum): pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhin ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba
91a8('bum): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// srog kyang ba.A zhes bya ba de nyid bdan gyi bzhin ni don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang 'a
91b1('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'o// srog kyang bzhin la lus kyang bzhin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ bzhan gyi don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang 'du
91b2('bum): shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa drongs nas yod ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhan gyi don med do// zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang
91b3('bum): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs nas med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod kyang yod la med kyang med ces
91b4('bum): bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs denas yod par 'gyur ba yang ma yinamed par 'gyur ba yang ma yin na sa bya ba de nyid bden gyi bzhan ni don med do// zhes bya ba de
91b5('bum): ni gzugs la gnas pa'o// de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o// zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de lta nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
91b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum bu yang
91b7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen du// rab 'byor bzhin yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi/ pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rten+da de/ gzugs mkhyen to// gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de/ 
91b8('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma ni ba de bzhi ni nyid 'gyuraro ba med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa la/ mtshan mi med cing byed po med pa/ spros pa med cing dmigs pa med pa de ltar mkhyen to// tshor ba dang 'du shes// 
92a1('bum): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mkhyen to// rnam par shes pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa la mtshan
92a2('bum): ma med cing byed pa med do/ spros pa med cing dmigasu med pa de ltar mkhyen to// rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zlab mo 'di la brten de/ sems can pha rol pa
92a3('bum): gang zag pha rol gyi 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang bcum pa rnas kyang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen do// ma nor po de bzhin nyid dang 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par
92a4('bum): rtog pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang spros phra med pa dang / dmigasu med pa dza lta bri bzhin du rab du mkhyen do// de ltar 'phro ba dang 'dra ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcu ma pI
92a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po'i de bzhini nyid do// phung po'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched kyi de/ bzhin nyid do// skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni khams
92a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid do// khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phung po'i de bzhin nyid do// phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yi nu ba de ni/ skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do skye mched kyi de bzhin gru
92a7('bum): yin pa de ni khams kyi de bzhin nyid do// khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do// rten 'grel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni
92a8('bum): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid de/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den stong pa
92b1('bum): nyid thams cad kyi dri bzhin banyid do// stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
92b2('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ gsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyud med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid de/ tshad mid dra bzhi'i de
92b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid
92b4('bum): ro/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i
92b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do// mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med/ 
92b6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid da/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mAtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni de bzhin grwa shegs pa'i stobs bcu'i dri bzhin nyid do// dezhin gshe/ 
92b7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin de nr-i mI 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig po bzhi'i de bzhin do// so so yang dag
92b8('bum): par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid// 
93a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad
93a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi du bzhin du zhid do// dag / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang smin pa dri ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin
93a3('bum): dag yin pa de ni mi dag pa'i tshisgra rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// 'jig rten pa'i rgyus rna rnan
93a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa bcas pa'i chos nas/ 
93a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid do// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// zug med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin
93a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin+d+ra pa dri ni
93a7('bum): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhini nyid do// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ 
93a8('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i di bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi
93b1('bum): kha'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// phyir mi 'ong / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// 
93b2('bum): rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi dri bzhini nyid do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang
93b3('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do// tha mi dang phyi
93b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa nyid do/ mi zad pa'i phyir gnyi su med de gnyisu byar med do// rab 'byor/ de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs
93b5('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rteni te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// rab 'byor de sa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed/ 
93b6('bum): nga'o// 'jig rten ston pa'i/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thug su chud do// mni
93b7('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / bzhan pa'i de bzhin nyid thug su chud do// de bzhin nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis
93b8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhin ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams ca
94a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / mu nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhin ma yin pa de bzhin nyid des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub brjod cing smos so// bcom
94a2('bum): ldan 'das slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rdzas dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma rtogs par
94a3('bum): su zhig 'dri la mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gla shegs pas de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ seMs can+da rnams la gsungs pa ni shin du bzab po// bcom
94a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid blud pa ste/ de ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/ chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir ro/ de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
94a5('bum): dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la gsung
94a6('bum): te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu ba las/ le'u sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ 
94a7('bum): bam po de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag lha rdzas kyi tsan dang
94a8('bum): gyi phye mas 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu/ 
94b1('bum): 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na yod pa ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pa/ 
94b2('bum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'do bshad pan/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ma'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag shes
94b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu drag shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes ra/ 
94b4('bum): kyi pha rol du phyinr-i pa zab mo 'di ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i ba
94b5('bum): dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ma'o ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lnga'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag
94b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ sna nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa za ba 'di ni rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dang / 
94b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob mo 'di ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab
94b8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab/ 
95a1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni na mkhwa'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzin
95a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi bdar bka'astsol te/ don dam par ni ma yin no// lha'i byi dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang mi dang lho ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzhin du bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir
95a3('bum): zhe na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad te/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid bzhin du mi byed do// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do// mtshan
95a4('bum): nyin ni mtshan nyid med par mi byed do// de ltar na mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang / 'u mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka yang gang gis shes par bya gang she
95a5('bum): par bya ba dang / gang shes par bya ba de lta bu mi srid do lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag na gzugs kyis 'das byas ma yin no/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pos 'du byas
95a6('bum): bla ma yin no// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel pa 'dus byas pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas 'dus pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
95a7('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / khas gtan kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rabaM kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid thams cad kyis 'dus byas
95a8('bum): pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 'das byas pa ma yin no// bsam gtan dang sa kas 'das pas
95b1('bum): tshad med pa dang sa kas 'das pas pa ma ya gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
95b2('bum): dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang snron pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin go shegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
95b3('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no// lha'i/ 
95b4('bum): bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ bzug pa med pa 'am/ 'jig/ rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas/ 
95b5('bum): sam 'dus ma byas kyis ma yin te/ lha'i bu la la zhig 'di skad du na mkha'i mtshan nyid gang min zhes zer na/ ci de yang dag par smra bas/ yang dag par smra ba yin nam// 
95b6('bum): gsol bcom ldan 'das de ni ma yin te/ yang dag par smra bas sgrub ma yin lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/ na mkha' la mtshan nyid ga
95b7('bum): yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid
95b8('bum): med pa'i dbyings de ni dab nini du gnas pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnar bar mngon par rigs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni/ 
96a1('bum): ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso ro// / 
96a2('bum): ldan 'das mtshan nyid de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs nas chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing / mtshan nyid
96a3('bum): de dag la zhugs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par
96a4('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag parabastan pas/ mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
96a5('bum): pa mtshan nyid zab mi mngon par rdzogs par/ sangs rgyaso// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pA zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
96a6('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod yul du 'gyur te/ de la spyad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
96a7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / mtshan nyid thams cad rab du dpe ba mdzad de/ 'di lta
96a8('bum): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye mchod kyi mtshan nyid dang / khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rten cing 'brel par
96b1('bum): 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye bar 'dzad pa ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
96b2('bum): gzugs yod pa na smyon pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dgra gzugs ni zhig du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/ 'di na dri bzhin gshegs pas tshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par spangs
96b3('bum): rgyas so// de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/ 'du shes na 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par shes pa ni so so bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid deng/ 
96b4('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// phung po rnams ni sdug sbrul gyi mtshan nyid/ khams rnams bdug pa'i mtshan nyid te/ de ni de
96b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// skye mched rnams ni byung ba'i sgra ji mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med
96b6('bum): byar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
96b7('bum): so// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni yongasu gdong ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyu so// lha'i bu dag tshul khri
96b8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni 'khrugs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid// 
97a1('bum): sdug bsas gangan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid/ gres rab kyi rol du phyin pa ni ma gsupa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin ga she gsu ma
97a2('bum): nyid ma bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bdum gdun pa'i dang / chang byed pa pani dang / byathogs skyed pa'i sgoms par 'jus bzhi pa'i 'ju glang 'is rgyan // 
97a3('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba med pa'i rgyun nyid de/ de dag ni dra ba ni
97a4('bum): gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni/ dedaben pa'i mtshan nyid de de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
97a5('bum): mtshan med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon/ 
97a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs
97a7('bum): par sangs rgyas// rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag na de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// stobs rnams ni shin du rna/ 
97a8('bum): par gdon mi za ba'i mtshan nyid mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin du rten pa'i mtshan nyid/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yong su mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid/ byams pa chen po ni phan pa bsgrub ngo/ 
97b1('bum): ma / chenu pa'i pa'i mtshan nas dgra' badren po du dga'ab padang sgoms chen pon ma 'dres pa na / ya rgyas kyi ma sa du/ 
97b2('bum): brgyad ni mi 'bregs pa'i mtshun nyid de/ de dag na bzhin gshegs pas mam nyid med byar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye zhes
97b3('bum): gsum gi mtshan nyid te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya so// lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan/ 
97b4('bum): nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas dpas de'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pan tshigs pa mI mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
97b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bAka' stsal to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegus pa bskyed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig
97b6('bum): rten ston pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing rnam
97b7('bum): par spyad do// chos de la rim 'gro mdzad cing mchod pa mdzad do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de bzhin gshegs pA rimi 'gro 'dzad pa dang / bkur sti 'dzad pa dang / sti stang 'dzad pa dang
97b8('bum): mchod mdzad pa ni chos dang ldan pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las bying ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa
98a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa dgongs pa'o// 
98a2('bum): rab 'byor gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing / byas pa dran pa'o zhes smra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing / byas pa dgongs pa'o zhes bya ba yang drag par
98a3('bum): swA bas yang dag par smra'o// rab 'byor gang la lo zhig de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis byon pa dang / lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa de nyid dang / 
98a5('bum): de nyid la dri bzhin gshegs pa rim 'gro mdzad pa dang / bkur sti mdzad pa dang / sti stang mdzad pa dong / mchod ba mdzad pa dang / yongasu srung ba 'dzad pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ni de/ 
98a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs pa lta'o// rab 'byor bzhin yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thas cad mtshan ma med pa la rten te/ byed pa po med pa'i phyir/ 
98a7('bum): thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya so// lus med pa'i phyir ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab
98a8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten te/ chos thams cad la bya ba med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byis pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs pa'o// rab
98b1('bum): 'byor bzhun yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa med pa/ chos thams cad la/ 
98b2('bum): 'jug pa med pa'i bdar 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o// 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol
98b3('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad shes pa po ma mchis shing / mthong ba po mi mchis na/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa na dri bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig
98b4('bum): rten 'di ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das da kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o// rab 'byor
98b5('bum): chos thams cad ni sbed pa gsog gsob/ dbang med pa snying po med pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
98b6('bum): bzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste/ rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
98b7('bum): ni mi dmigs shing khong du chud pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni
98b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'i // de yang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// tsho rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i
99a1('bum): phyir ston pa'o// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba med pa'i phyir/ 
99a2('bum): ston pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs mthong
99a3('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na/ skye mched
99a4('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i srad du ston pa lpags/ ji ltar na rnam par cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad
99a5('bum): du ston pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir
99a6('bum): sbyin pa'o// nam tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// na
99a7('bum): skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rten cing 'o brel bar 'byung ba/ mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam pa/ 
99a8('bum): rol du phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ pha rol du phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
99b1('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthur
99b2('bum): gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
99b3('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dA ni dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres brgyad la // 
99b4('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir sgren po'o// rgam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam pas
99b5('bum): shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// rab 'byor de wAr na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
99b6('bum): bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor bzhin yang ji ltar na/ de bzhin gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyod cing / 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
99b7('bum): 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig rten stong pa zhes brjod de/ 'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes brjod ce na/ phung po lnga stong ngo // zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// skye mched bcu gnyis
99b8('bum): spong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// khams ba cwo brgyad spong nge zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chen cing 'brel b.ra'i byeng ba'i yan log bcu gnyis snying ji zhes bya bar 'jog rje
100a1('bum): brjod do// pha rol du phyin pa drug spong ngo // zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
100a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun spong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
100a3('bum): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
100a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gtso/ 
100a5('bum): pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sdang ngo zhes
100a6('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskye
100a7('bum): cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor bzhin yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong do zhes bya bar ston/ 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod do// 'jig rte
100a8('bum): spong ngo zhes bya bar shes par byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'i// rab 'byor bzhin yang shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ 
100b1('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten du stong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ji ltar ston ce na/ 'jig rten phung po'i stong zhes bya bar ston to/ 'jig rten na skye mched dang / khams
100b2('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
100b3('bum): pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / gsam gdan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / ga
100b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
100b5('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jig
100b6('bum): pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bcu rgyad stong zhes bya bar spyon do// 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
100b7('bum): pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor bzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol
100b8('bum): phyin pa ni/ 'jig rten gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar na 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na/ phung po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// skye mched dang kha
101a1('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston do// 
101a2('bum): rab 'byor bzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zang mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten ji ltar yod ben zhes bya bar ston ce na/ phung na
101a3('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig
101a4('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed/ cing 'jig rten ston to// rab 'byor bzhan yang shes rab kyi
101a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid zhes bya bar ston to/ ji ltar na/ 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
101a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston ce na/ phung po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mchod dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
101a7('bum): sdong po zhes bya bar ston te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor bzhin yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
101a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong baM zhes bya bar ston ce no/ phung po'i 'jig rten ngo ba nyid kyis spong ba/ 
101b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston dro// skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis spong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig
101b2('bum): rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing ston pa'o// rab 'byor bzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
101b3('bum): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar smon ce na// phung po'i 'jig rten
101b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ta to// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'ji/ ga rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// / 
101b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jigarten gyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byo ra bzhin yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
101b6('bum): ba la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ phung po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang rten ci de 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig
101b7('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor bzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig
101b8('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ji ltam/ 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ phung po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
102a1('bum): pa'i 'brel ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
102a2('bum): tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/ ji nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su/ 
102a3('bum): 'ang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston ce na// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten 'dra'i 'du shesu 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig rten pha rol
102a4('bum): gyi 'du shesu 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das
102a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// 
102a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
102a7('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin ni de de bzhin de / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// rab
102a8('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / don dpag du med pa dang / don bzhal du med pa dang / de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab
102b1('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
102b2('bum): rnams kyi don chen dam pra ste/ 'di ltar sems ldan thams cad dusgrub pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yong su mI gdong ba'i don to// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du
102b3('bum): ba ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / byang chub nyid dang / rnarapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dri
102b4('bum): gyis mi khyab pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasas rgyas kyis don bsam gyis
102b5('bum): mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don dpag du med pa'i phyi ma nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can/ 
102b6('bum): du bsdu bas smras pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gsam pa dang / dpag pur nus pa de lta bu gang yang
102b7('bum): med do// rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// 
102b8('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don bzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid das
103a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bzhal du med / sus kyang bzhal bar mi nus so// rlub 'byor nas drangs de smanadu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bani na gshegs pa dgra
103a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir zhi bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don mi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin no/ 
103a3('bum): na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mnyam pas mnyam pa su yang med na/ lhago pa lnga ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes
103a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don mi mnyam/ pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnaso// gsol pa bcom
103a5('bum): ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen nyid dang na bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa/ 
103a6('bum): mnyam pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor songs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid da / thams cad / 
103a7('bum): shes pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag du med bzhal du med de mi mnyam pa
103a8('bum): dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med pa zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
103b1('bum): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/ bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med
103b2('bum): bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'o// rnam pa thams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bor yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
103b3('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag du med/ bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni ni sems mi/ 
103b4('bum): dmigaso// seMs las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor gzugs gsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ba zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab
103b5('bum): 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag du med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor
103b6('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag du med pa zhal du med do ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams ca
103b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab dngag du med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis mi
103b8('bum): khyab dngag du ma mchis bzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med
104a1('bum): bzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab
104a2('bum): dpag du ma mchis bzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam mi khyab/ dpag du ma mchis zhal
104a3('bum): tu ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam
104a4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshor dab dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la leng bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmis
104a5('bum): so// skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yang bsom pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rnam thams can mkhyen pa ni
104a6('bum): kyi bar la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
104a7('bum): mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / 
104a8('bum): mi mnyam mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmi/ 
104b1('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / rnga tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmyigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
104b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med/ gzhal tu med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la gsam pa dang / dpag pa
104b3('bum): dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa mi mnyam pa mi dmigasaso// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med/ bzhal du
104b4('bum): med lnga/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang / dpag pa da tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// skye mched dang / khams dang
104b5('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa zhal du med la mi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / 
104b6('bum): tshad dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi khar gyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag du med/ bzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
104b7('bum): ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gzugs gang bas
104b8('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag du med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmig su yod dam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi
105a1('bum): khrab pa dadrub tu med pa nal du med pa s+ho/ skyes rnam pa dang mnyan pa de la ga dang / na shes dang / du byed drug rnam pa dashes pa dmig su yongasasu skye
105a2('bum): dang khams dang / rten ci 'byel bar 'byung ba gang gsum gyis mi khyang dpag du med pa nal du med pa ste/ mos nam pa dang mnyem pa de la rje mi 'brel bur 'byung ba migasu yo
105a3('bum): nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gleng bsam gyis mi khyang dpag du med pazhal du med pa ste/ me mnyam pa mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigasu yod dam/ ga
105a4('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das drin ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na/ rnam gras 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyad dpag du ma/ 
105a5('bum): bzhal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshis nyid 'di dag ni bsnam pa dang / bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang dran/ 
105a6('bum): ba'i phyir dpag du med do// tshad dang dral ba'i phyir bzhal du med do// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ chos thas cis
105a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag du med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongasu 'das pa pas bas
105a8('bum): gyis mi khyab po'o/ dpag pa las yongasu 'dres pas/ na dpag du med pa'o// tshad las yongasu 'das pa na bzhal du med pa'o// mi mnyam dang mnyam pa las yongasu mangs pas na mi mnyam pa dang / 
105b1('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni/ bsum du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor dpag du med ces bya ba 'di ni/ dpag du med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab
105b2('bum): 'byor ba zhal tu med ces bya ba de ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor de
105b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsdam gyis mi khyab ces/ 
105b4('bum): bya ba ni namakha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag du med ces bya ba ni na mkha' dpag du med pa'i phyir ro// bzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro// mi mnyam pa dang
105b5('bum): mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/ na mkha' mi mnyam pa bsde dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin ga shegs pas de bzhin shegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
105b6('bum): du med pa la mi monyamu pa dang mnyam pa dang / de dag ni lha dang mi dang / lho ma yin dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten+da na bsam gyis mi khyab dpag par mi nus te/ de lta r+ya na sangs rgyas
105b7('bum): rnams kyi bzhal du med pa'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / bzhal du med pa dang / mi
105b8('bum): mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa/ med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni phrag nyi shu
106a1('bum): nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnam sri las sems rnam par grol lo// dge snyen pa stong phrag drug bcu dang / dge snyen ma stong phrag sum bcu ni/ chos rnams
106a2('bum): brtul dang / dral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
106a3('bum): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan te// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// 
106a4('bum): le'u sum bcu gsum pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
106a5('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// don tshad ma mchis pa dang/ 
106a6('bum): don dpag du ma mchis pa dang / don bzhil du ma mchis pa'i slad de nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam bI slad du nye bar
106a7('bum): gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// 
106a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'di'i don tshad med pa dang don dpag tu med pa dang / don bzhal du med pa dang / don mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas po'o// de ci'i phyir
106b1('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga 'dus// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir ni/ nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa stong panyi
106b2('bum): kyi bar du 'duso// dran pa nye bar bzhag po rnams 'dus so// yong dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
106b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / glang ni bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang
106b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ste rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/ 
106b5('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa drang mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ti nge 'dzin rnams dang / bzhad gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i sngo bcu dang / mA 'jigs
106b6('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
106b7('bum): 'dir ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba/ srid rten par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dregs pa 'am
106b8('bum): yul gyi dgos pra gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad blon po las su bcug pa rgyal po'i dgos pa dang // yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khrur bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin
107a1('bum): du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos grang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha
107a2('bum): rol du phyin par 'dus so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed de/ rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes
107a3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// kau shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'di'i bya ba dpag du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
107a4('bum): tu phyin pa ni bya ba bzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
107a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zeb mo 'di ni gzugs la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon pa chags pa med pa nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
107a6('bum): 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la yongasu 'dzin med pa dang / mngon pa rul tshogs pa med par nye bar gnas de'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la yongasu lan
107a7('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa la nye bar gnas pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar/ 
107a8('bum): gnas pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gzugs la yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nyes
107b1('bum): gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pas mchis par nye bar gnas pa lag+sa/ 
107b2('bum): ji ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yongasasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'dri
107b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rje rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis gzugs gang yongasu bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ chos gang yang yongasu 'dzi
107b4('bum): bar byed pa dang / mngon parba chags par byed pa'am/ gang gis yongasu bzung bar bya ba'am/ mngon por chags par bya ba de lta bu yang mthong ngam/ chos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
107b5('bum): de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis tshor skye ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang
107b6('bum): yongasu bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yang mthong ngam/ chos gang yang yongasu 'dzin par byed pa dang / mngon par chags par byed pa 'am gang gis yongasu bzung
107b7('bum): bar bya 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yang mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' srul po/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
107b8('bum): khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bir du yongasu bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yang mthong ngam/ chos gang yang yongasu 'dzin par byed pa dang / mngon
108a1('bum): chags par byed pa dang / grang gis yongasu bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// brtse
108a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gong yongasu bzung bar bya ba'am/ mngon pa chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ 
108a3('bum): chos gang yong su bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yang mthong ngam/ gang gis yongasu bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ gsol
108a4('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du seMs/ khyod kyis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yongasu
108a5('bum): bzung bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ chos gang yang yongasu 'dzin par byed pa dang mngon par chags par byed pa 'am/ gang gis yongasu bzung
108a6('bum): bar bya ba 'am/ mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legaso legs so// 
108a7('bum): rab 'byor ngas kyang gzugs yang dag por rje su mo mthong ste// yang dag par rje su mA rathong bas/ yongasu mi 'dzin yongs myi 'dzin pas/ nye bar gnas pa mi len to// rab 'byor dus kyu
108a8('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rje suM mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rje sum mthong bas/ yongasu mi 'dzin yongasu mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi 'in
108b1('bum): rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du/ yang dag par de dag kyang rje su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ yongasu mi 'dzin yongasu mi 'dzi/ 
108b2('bum): bas/ nye bar mi len to// rab 'byor ngas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjesu
108b3('bum): ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjesu ma mthong bas/ yongasu mi 'dzin yongasu myi 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to// rab 'byor de lta ba sa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen pos gzugs la
108b4('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongasu
108b5('bum): bzung bar mi bya'o// skye mchod dang / khams dang / rten par 'byung ba la mngon par tshigs mi bya'o// yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid/ 
108b6('bum): thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam/ dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
108b7('bum): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par she/ 
108b8('bum): pa rnams dang ding nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dpa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams te/ 
109a1('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
109a2('bum): byang chub kyi bar la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi// 
109a3('bum): bya'o// yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lho'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
109a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing lta dka' la/ gtogs par dka' ba ste/ mi rtag pa'i spyod yul ma lugs/ zhi zhing phra bu la da mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang / yadi bsal bas 'arga
109a5('bum): bar ba gyi ba 'am/ bcom ldan 'das// sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa za ba mi 'di la mos par 'di dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
109a6('bum): sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni dge bo'i rtsa ba shes gnyen gyis yongasu bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong
109a7('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba dang / chos kyi 'arje su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / 
109a8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha/ 
109b1('bum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing bsams te/ gzhal ba dang / rtag pa dang / spyod pa gnyis ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di gdugs gcig tu
109b2('bum): mos pa de nyid du ches mchog tu 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / brgyad po dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'od
109b3('bum): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji snyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skyo ba'i
109b4('bum): chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin
109b5('bum): de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i dang chos kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom / 
109b6('bum): nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spyong ba dang / ci tsam pa dang / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos lnga bzod pa thob pa'i bzod/ 
109b7('bum): so/ drung gi gas kyi 'a migs kyi bla mo gang yangs / rol du sbyin pa 'a ma sa rje ba di'i khri
109b8('bum): 'brog mi dpa pa na byed pa dang tshul bzhin ming la byed pa de dag ni myung du bla na med pa byung ba thos par bya'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i ras kyi rlom
110a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa de dag ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
110a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyira'o// 
110a3('bum): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slab pa dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bslab par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin
110a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ 
110a5('bum): dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher stan to/ de nas 'dod po na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de
110a6('bum): dag gi ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen mesto/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shos rab kyi pha rol
110a7('bum): du phyin pa 'dri ni dpag tu med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'di ni bzhal du med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'di ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pharo// 
110a8('bum): du phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing dad pa'i rje suM 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rje su 'brang ba dang brgyad po dang rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan gcig phyir 'o// 
110b1('bum): ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur de la/ 
110b2('bum): bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab / 
110b3('bum): 'di 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel bar byed kyang mi gda'o// zhes nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM/ 
110b4('bum): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste/ de dag shin du'ang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'drod pa na spyod pa'i lho'i bu dag gis 'dod pa'i kham su 'khod/ gzugs so/ 
110b5('bum): pan spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis gzugs yod pa/ khamasu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'dra la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
110b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing gong du bri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
110b7('bum): la bgyid pa na de gang shi 'phos te 'dir skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
110b8('bum): thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur rmongs par mi 'gyur// the tsom mi za/ nom nur mi byed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par dka' zhing shes rab
111a1('bum): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag dang bral bar mi byed la yid la byed pa de dag 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste rtag tu/ 
111a2('bum): rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig par mi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la rgyun chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor dper na ba grus ma be'u mi 'dor ba ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas
111a3('bum): mi 'di'i don la nam shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas dran pas 'dris par ma byas te/ ra yid kyis gtogs par ma byas/ lta bas khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba/ 
111a4('bum): de mi gtong na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i seMs dpa' chen po'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas/ shi 'phos nA mi'i nang du skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni 'di ltar byed/ 
111a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas bzung ba dang bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang
111a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byas par 'gyuraro/ gong du yang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang gdugs dang na bza' dang rgyal mtshon dang / 
111a7('bum): ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par 'gyur ro/ bkur bsti dang bsti bstang dang / mchod pa byas par gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mau'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te shes
111a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yang thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur bar blta'o// // dum bu gsum pa/ bam po brgyad pa// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang
111b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang bris nas kyang lung 'jog pa dang kha don bgyid
111b2('bum): tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa las yon tan 'di nyid dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan las bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de dag de
111b3('bum): lnga bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gan
111b4('bum): dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa las 'di las shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas de ma thag tu mos par 'gyur// mos par gyur nas kyang
111b5('bum): 'dri'o/ bris nas kyang lung 'bogo/ kha don du byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas ba/ 
111b6('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos/ thos nas kyang bzung / bcang so/ yongs su bcangaso// klagaso/ kun chub par byas/ kha don du byaso/ tshul bzhin du ming
111b7('bum): la byas/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyeso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'i ldan gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnya
111b8('bum): par shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du bskal pa mnyam par skyes na yang de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
112a1('bum): dpa' chen po des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byams pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongasu btags pas yongasu dris pa de nas/ 
112a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang gis sngon gyi mtha' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos kyang yongasu ma
112a3('bum): dris yongasu rtag pa ma byas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur rmongs par 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur// sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur/
