137a3('bum): chos ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro myi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
137a4('bum): sems dpa' tshe thams dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu meng kyi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnaMs kyi lam du gyur pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
137a5('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de drag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor
137a6('bum): chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba med 'dra ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
137a7('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul na/ de las mi 'di'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par
137a8('bum): 'du byed pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi skye ste mi
137b1('bum): 'gag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye mi 'gag pa lnga 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon
137b2('bum): mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag gi ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am
137b3('bum): 'ong ba med do// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de la mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba ming mig so// rab 'byor chos thos
137b4('bum): tsaR+sha nI sgyu ma'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu mA la 'gro ba 'am 'ong bya mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgra brnyan gyi ngang tshul
137b5('bum): can te/ dro dag ra dzA tsA la de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhenang sgra brnyan la 'gro ba 'o ma 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshe sa thams cad ni mig yor gyi drang tshul can te/ de dag ni
137b6('bum): ngang tshul de la su mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig lnga 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs rnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// 
137b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smi ga rgyu'i ngang tshul can de/ de ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smig rgyu la
137b8('bum): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chu zla'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu zlal gro ba 'am dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams
138a1('bum): cad ni sprul pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos ca thams cad ni mtha'
138a2('bum): yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i dza tsun+da te/ de dag ni nga tshul de las mi 'da'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa la 'gro ba 'amo 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab
138a3('bum): chos thams cad ni dbyung ba dang mi byung ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbyung ba dang mi dbyung ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi
138a4('bum): dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba dang bsnan pa pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dgra ni ngang tshul de las mi mdo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da bri bra dang bsnan pa med pa la
138a5('bum): ba'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de la mi mda'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ong ba med pa lang 'gro ba 'ama'o/ 
138a6('bum): pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba dang / der ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa de la 'gro ba'i// 
138a7('bum): 'a bru mra dmigs so// rab 'byor chos sems cad ni phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med+ma ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de dag lngas mi mdor
138a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul/ 
138b1('bum): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi mda'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta gu la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can dang srog dang / 'a/ 
138b2('bum): ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang khyed du 'jug pa po dang / slong bre bo dang / yongasu slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes
138b3('bum): pA po dang mthong ba po'i ngang tshul can de de dag ni ngang tshulnga de la las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba po nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba'i 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad/ 
138b4('bum): ni rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de lA mi mnga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba dang / 
138b5('bum): mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag na ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ skrag pa nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lnga ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni// 
138b6('bum): mi rdeg pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ rab 'byor mi rtag pa nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lhag lnga yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba
138b7('bum): dang bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/ rab 'byor mi skyug pa nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta gA la ye/ 
138b8('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kyang / shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba'i/ 
139a1('bum): 'ong ba lnga ga yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang shin du med na/ 
139a2('bum): de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin du
139a3('bum): med na/ de la dngos po 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lcug la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul can de/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lnga po'i
139a4('bum): rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba pa'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul du lus can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
139a5('bum): na/ rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa'i dri bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang yang dge ba'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
139a6('bum): dbyings kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na du rab 'byor chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs// rab 'byor chos thams cad
139a7('bum): ni mi g.yo ba'i ngang tshul canA ti/ de dag ni ngang tshul de lus 'das 'ode ci'i phyir zhe no// chos gang la yang g.yo ba med do/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs
139a8('bum): kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
139b1('bum): ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dra'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lcug la
139b2('bum): yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na de la 'grib
139b3('bum): 'ong ba lnga ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
139b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can+da te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'do'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lkog la yod
139b5('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad na ning stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'i ma 'od pa
139b6('bum): lhag la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngang tshul can po/ de dag nA ngang tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa
139b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor yang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'ad/ 
139b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang / shin du med na de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lto ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / rang / 
140a1('bum): bo dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngang tshul can po de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam nyid
140a2('bum): kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / gsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
140a3('bum): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
140a4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul
140a5('bum): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos mra 'dres pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams
140a6('bum): cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul tsan te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'di'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba
140a7('bum): lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las maM/ 
140a8('bum): 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
140b1('bum): kying tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs sa// gsol pa bcom ldan
140b2('bum): de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med
140b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshe/ 
140b4('bum): gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ 
140b5('bum): le'u sum bcu drug pa'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
140b6('bum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ni ji ltar bu zhig du 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang mtshan ma dang / rnam pa ji lta bu zhig/ 
140b7('bum): du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri la mis par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags rnam
140b8('bum): par stsal pa dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par rtsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// bab 'byor byang chub
141a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mugs
141a2('bum): gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
141a3('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pas rang bzhin du 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur/ 
141a4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rnams pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
141a5('bum): po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yong su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
141a6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri yongasu shes pa 'gyur ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ 
141a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul tsan te/ sems can gyi brten du gyur pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
141b1('bum): dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs te/ de dag ni dka' ba bgyid
141b2('bum): pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin ni de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzlas par bya'o// 
141b3('bum): zhen go cha 'di dgos pa 'di thams cad dka' bar byed pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
141b4('bum): gzugs kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i gi tshe yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor sems dpa'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
141b5('bum): byed dang rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorar+ya rnam par shes pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de ci'i phyir gro cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel
141b6('bum): pa ma yin no zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems pa'o sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing
141b7('bum): 'brel bar 'byung srung shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i sesmras pa la 'anang gi rgyu yang rid pas/ de ci'i phyir gi cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'brel ba mi yin zhes bya'o// rang 'gyur
141b8('bum): de ni bdag dang 'brel pa yin/ sems can dang 'brel pa yin/ srog dang 'brel pa yin/ skye ba dang 'brel pa yin/ gso ba dang 'brel pa yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel pa yin/ gang zag dang 'brel pa/ 
142a1('bum): yin/ shid can dang 'brel ba yin/ shed bdag dang 'brel pa yin/ byed pa po dang 'brel ba yin/ tshe ba po drang 'brel pa yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel pa yin/ mthong / 
142a2('bum): po dang 'brel pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba po yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas de ci'i phyir / go cha de ni mthong ba blo dang 'brel pa
142a3('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pA yang shin du med la
142a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir dgo cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
142a5('bum): do ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gratan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
142a6('bum): tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir/ go cha de ni shes / 
142a7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go tshe de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor na/ 
142a8('bum): stong pa nyid ding shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tshe yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
142b1('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems
142b2('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel bi ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go tshe de ni dran pa nye
142b3('bum): bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhug pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
142b4('bum): dang / slad dgra yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / skyabs dang byang chub kyi
142b5('bum): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan+da lagau brgyad pa dang 'dre la pa ma yin te/ dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lamra ya na/ lag brgyad pa yang shin du med la byang chub seM saM dpya'i gr-in+da yang no
142b6('bum): pas de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa
142b7('bum): ma yin te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad kyi shin du med na/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha ming med pas/ de'i phyir go ma de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel po ma yin/ zhes bya'o// 
142b8('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag gis mongasu mya ngan las zla bar bya'od zhes go cha dgos pa
143a1('bum): de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no// gsol pa bcwo ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongasu lus bzla'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des na
143a2('bum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyisu dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
143a3('bum): ses dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos sa 'chos
143a4('bum): bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha mtshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' ses
143a5('bum): dpa' chen po de ltar go cha dgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sde 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyi su dogs par mi bya'o// zhes smras/ 
143a6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can nyi tshe nyung zad gcig gi slad du go cha 'tshol ba ma legs// ye shes ba cung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du
143a7('bum): go cha 'tshal ba ma legs te/ de ci'i srid du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal de/ 
143a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin na/ 
143b1('bum): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang
143b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems ca thams cad ni yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don du go cha bgros so// gsol pa bcom ldan
143b3('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi nI yang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang sgom par mi bgyiSh+To/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes
143b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang sbom por bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis sgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs 'grub pa dmi gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes su
143b5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa skem pa ni nam mkha' sgom pa'o// ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste ste
143b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
143b7('bum): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de ni sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de gang sgom pa rnam par sgom
143b8('bum): pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom
144a1('bum): pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di
144a2('bum): niskye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa na par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom
144a3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / srog dang gso ba dang skyes bu da gang zag dang shed can dang / shed bdag dang khyed
144a4('bum): pa po dang / tshor ba po dang shes rab po dang mthong po po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das te 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
144a5('bum): sgom pa ni rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
144a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gdun kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan+da 'das 'dri lta sde shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
144a7('bum): 'di ni/ nang sdong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par sbon pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar rje sgom pa rnam par sgom tho/ 
144a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di lta sde shes rab
144b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldang 'dras 'di lte ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu
144b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni 'ab
144b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa dag
144b4('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med skye ba dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
144b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du sgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
144b6('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i bras bu sgom
144b7('bum): pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lan cig phyir ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom po nyid dang / rang byang chub rna
144b8('bum): pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
145a1('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du
145a2('bum): phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni skye mched de dang khams dang rten
145a3('bum): cing 'brel dur 'byung ba sgom pa rnam par spyos pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinapa
145a4('bum): sgom pa 'di ni sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dpa gang zag dang / shod can dang / shed bdag dang / byed ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po sgom pa rnam pa
145a5('bum): sgom par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams cad sgom pa rnapar sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ 
145a6('bum): sgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// raba'i byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga
145a7('bum): sde shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshod med pa rnams dang / gzugs med du'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang mthur
145a8('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ 
145b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs
145b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sde par med shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
145b3('bum): do nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon pa
145b4('bum): chags pa med dam/ zhes rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpe
145b5('bum): dpa' sems pa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyi na pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa/ 
145b6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam/ zhes/ gsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'du kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
145b7('bum): sbyin pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
145b8('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// byang
145'a1('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la chags pa sred dam zhes byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nas la~M byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtags par bya'o// 
145'a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / gsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
145'a3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dring nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med do// zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bya/ 
145'a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu rtagi par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa tshon
145'a5('bum): pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mngon par rgyags pa med dam/ zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/ byang chub sems
145'a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su jug par bya'o// rnam thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems
145'a7('bum): dpa' chen po yongasu rtag par bya'o// phyir mi lkug pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lnga spyad pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol
145'a8('bum): gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lto 'am/ phyir mi ldog po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe// rol gyi dad pas zi 'gro ba 'am phyin
145'b1('bum): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la spyad pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phags pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang
145'b2('bum): bcas pa la/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod
145'b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur dam de tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ngan/ brtson 'grus
145'b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes yongasasu rtag par byi ste/ 
145'b5('bum): gal te phyir moM ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa mi 'jigs mi sbyang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang yongasu zhum
145'b6('bum): par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la tA thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang / klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du
145'b7('bum): yid la byed de/ de bzhin nyid du nan dan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yingasu dris ni
145'b8('bum): yongasu brtag par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcang ste/ kun chub par byos pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
146a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i
146a2('bum): phyir mi ldog la thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146a3('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe// mi 'jigs ma sdang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur yong su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
146a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po des shrI rab kyi pha rol du/ phyin pa zab mo 'di ji lngar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byaka 'o stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
146a5('bum): po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di rtag par bya'o// gso la pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
146a6('bum): pa nyid la bzhol ba'i sems pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
146a7('bum): stong pa nyid lnga gzhol ba'i bsam bsu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
146a8('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / skye ba med dang / 'gag pa med pa la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la
146b1('bum): bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
146b2('bum): pa'i dbyings la bzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i med la bzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
146b3('bum): yin/ rmi lim dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smyig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhog pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shwa
146b4('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la bzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
146b5('bum): ba zab mo 'di la rtog 'gyur zhing rdo// mtshan ma mchi ces pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
146b6('bum): mchis pangs rnam par bying ba ma mchis pa dang rkyed dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang mngon par 'du bya'am mchi/ 
146b7('bum): pa dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan da / sgru banan dang / smrig rgyu dang / sgyu ma drung / sprul pa la bzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyuran/ 
146b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs la rtog pa legs sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed do / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lag/ 
147a1('bum): sam/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brdog pa lags sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang ngabyang chub kyi phyogs
147a2('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang du gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa rnams dang rnam pa
147a3('bum): thar pa dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mu med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ti
147a4('bum): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang de mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
147a5('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brnas la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtogs
147a6('bum): ba liM lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tsher bo da dang / 'du shes
147a7('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
147a8('bum): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gdoni rnams dang / tshad
147b1('bum): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i
147b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnamaso// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ 
147b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dgra par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chun po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sang
147b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brlal ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar// 
147b5('bum): rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin/ pa de ni sus kyang mA byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du 'ang ma song / phyogs na yang
147b6('bum): mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas te de la grang mo dmig so// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs so// gang la drangs mi dmigs po dang / 'gro
147b7('bum): drang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ma yin na/ 
147b8('bum): skye mched dang // khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin no sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brjod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyi ma
148a1('bum): bsam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma chi/ 
148a2('bum): no// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi min no// yang dag par spong po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
148a3('bum): rnams dang / ya mu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams
148a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba dring / 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa nye thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad m-i la// sangs rgyas
148a5('bum): kyi chos mi 'dres pa bcwa brgya da/ dwe ni phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar grang yin pa de ni/ 
148a6('bum): bzhin nyid bcig pa'o// tshor de dang ji 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shrIs pa gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa d+ma ni de bzhin nyid
148a7('bum): bcig pa'o// skye mched dang / khams drang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig
148a8('bum): pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin
148b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gdan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad/ 
148b2('bum): dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang nA tshun ma med pa dang / smon du med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
148b3('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid sde zhi pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
148b4('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin
148b5('bum): nyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bcig pa'o/ shes rab kyi pa ro// 
148b6('bum): du phyin pa stong drag ni shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum bcu bdun du'o// da sa 'ad de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod ni
148b7('bum): g+h+r-i'i bu rnams lce rdzas kyi tsan dun gyi phye ma dang / l-I rdzas kyi mye tog ud bre la dang/ bid mo dang / ku mut+pa dang / pun+na tA ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de log su mtho/ 
148b8('bum): bar gyur do/ gau tor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la la skye bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs bcig du 'khod do// de nis 'dod pa/ 
149a1('bum): spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/ 
149a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
149a3('bum): kyang gzugaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sde/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mnad
149a4('bum): rang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
149a5('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshul khris kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brgyan
149a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi
149a7('bum): rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad
149a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams
149b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam man/ 
149b2('bum): lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsum gtan dang / 
149b3('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa steg rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par
149b4('bum): thar pa dang mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa drang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
149b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas/ 
149b6('bum): kyi chos 'dres pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chosam 'dres pa'o// gzugs med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nI/ rnam
149b7('bum): bla thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su me cing gnyi sa byar med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i dpe ni/ 
149b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / 
150a1('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste
150a2('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid// 
150a3('bum): kha cig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyim pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
150a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin po de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig pa// 
150a5('bum): ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid// 
150a6('bum): ba cig pa skye gnyi su myed cing gnyis byur med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyide bzhin / 
150a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig po ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do/ dran pa nye bar bzhig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
150a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa sbed gnyi su med cing gnyi sa byar med do// yang 'dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang byang chub kyi yan/ 
150b1('bum): lag dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de / de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste/ gnyi su med ni
150b2('bum): gnyis byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams
150b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa skyed gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
150b4('bum): dang rnam par gyur pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dI 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin ga zugs pa'i stobs
150b5('bum): bAcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bani dpe byams pa chen po dang dri/ snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
150b6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid yi ni 'du gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / 
150b7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / drang sangs rgyas drang / byang chub sems dpa'i dang sangs rgyu sa kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
150b8('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// zhes bston pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
151a1('bum): rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing lta dka' ba la khong du chud pa dka' zhing rtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ ni ni
151a2('bum): phra ba bzhi ma mo mkhas shing rtog pas rig par bgyi ba sngo/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches por dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa/ 
151a3('bum): sgyid pa'i lnga'i bu de dag la bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
151a4('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugaso// tshor ba dang / 'du / dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par
151a5('bum): shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dpa rjen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'o// sbyin
151a6('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ster rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyi
151a7('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brasam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
151a8('bum): pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
151b1('bum): du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pani
151b2('bum): kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
151b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
151b4('bum): 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
151b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpar gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi
151b6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma sa pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thas cad
151b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chose ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
151b8('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 'ad
152a1('bum): gcig bya ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byur med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rjen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba di bzhin nying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
152a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
152a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med gnyi su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson// 
152a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ 
152a5('bum): debazhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid glang yin+da/ 
152a6('bum): bde ni/ de bzhin nyid cig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
152a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin cig pa ste/ gnyi sa med cing ga nyi su byar med do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ 
152a8('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byor med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs da // byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
152b1('bum): 'phags pi lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa tham+bu smra byung mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste/ gaN+DI mu med de gnyi sa byung
152b2('bum): med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gdan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
152b3('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
152b4('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs ba ba'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa/ 
152b5('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
152b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig pa snying ginyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
152b7('bum): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
152b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ gnyi su med de gnyisu byar med do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las
153a1('bum): chung ba la/ thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la bzhol bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zad
153a2('bum): cing lta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phru zil bzhib pa 'khas shing rtog par rig par bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis
153a3('bum): yid ches par dka' ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs mo rgyas nam+ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par rdzogs par spangs ma rgyas
153a4('bum): gang la gnyisu kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag na mkha' zad pa'i phyir ches 'ad zab po// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zlab pa'i phyir chos 'di ska
153a5('bum): po// lha'i bu dge chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir chos 'di
153a6('bum): zab po// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' mo med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'o zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dge mo skye mi 'gag/ 
153a7('bum): pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir/ chos 'di za po// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma/ 
153a8('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir
153b1('bum): chos 'di zab po/ sems can dang / srog dang 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mtho/ 
153b2('bum): bapapo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di dag zab po// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ 
153b3('bum): lha'i bu dag skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di dag zab bo// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ chos 'di dag rdza
153b4('bum): po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsom gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
153b5('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir 'ad phyin pa chos 'di zab bo// nang steng po nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab de
153b6('bum): lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'dra
153b7('bum): pA'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i
153b8('bum): phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ma med par
154a1('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dag
154a2('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'gres pa bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lnga'i bu rnams kyis
154a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis mid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de ci'i slang du zhen+da/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad/ 
154a4('bum): du snyan pa lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang sa 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bsten pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad dam lags
154a5('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad/ 
154a6('bum): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i skems par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
154a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin ga
154a8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gzung ba'i slad du
154b1('bum): bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ lan cig phyi
154b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du/ 
154b3('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugaso// bdag ni gzugaso/ bdag ni tshor ba'o// bdag gis tshor bar bya'o// bdag ni 'du shes so/ bdag gis 'du shes can ni// 
154b4('bum): bdag ni 'du byed do// bdag ni 'du byed can no// bdag ni rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o// dra dag gi skye mched do// khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// 
154b5('bum): bdag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos can no// bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gisde sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gis
154b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gis bza dpa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol
154b7('bum): du byin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gis bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bA sam gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs
154b8('bum): por bya'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin de'i// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa bya'o// bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ bdag gi nang stong pa nyid la gom
155a1('bum): par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro// bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la goms par bya'o// bdag gis dran pa
155a2('bum): nye bar bzhag pa'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la spyod par bya'o// bdag gi yang dag par spong ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
155a3('bum): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam ga dan+da dang / 
155a4('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
155a5('bum): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'o// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo la spyod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs bI s+hos mi 'jigs pa dang so
155a6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la skyed par bya'o// bdag gi/ 
155a7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi rgyun du zhwa gas pa'i 'bras bur 'gyuraro// bdag gi lan cig phyir rjong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur// bdag gi phyir mi 'ang dri'i 'bras bu
155a8('bum): bdag gos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'brus bu'o// bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang byang chub kyi// 
155b1('bum): bdag ni rang sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro// bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gyuro// zhis bgyi bar 'dzin par la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
155b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yino// mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
155b3('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir snyan pa ma yin/ skye mchod dang de khams dang / rten cing 'byung ba bzung ba'i phyir/ bstan pa ma yin/ mig
155b4('bum): de mo phyi ma yin/ mi brdzun/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / spor ba nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes sum bcu rtsa bdun/ gzung ba'i phyir bstan po ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir/ 
155b5('bum): ma yin/ 'phags pa'i badren pa dang / bsam gta/ ma dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ daM / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
155b6('bum): par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bzung ba'i phyir/ bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir/ ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung
155b7('bum): kyi sgo dpe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mA 'dres pa bzung
155b8('bum): pa'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lha'i bu dag gang yang
156a1('bum): gzugs bzung ba'i phyir rwa med mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa/ 
156a2('bum): dang / skye mched dang / khas dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
156a3('bum): phyogs kyi tshis sum bcu rtsa bdun bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gdan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
156a4('bum): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar / gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bzung ba'i phyir ram
156a5('bum): mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang // mngon par shes sa ting nge 'dzin dpya gzungs kyi sgo nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig/ 
156a6('bum): pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar/ 
156a7('bum): bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sa ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
156a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsum gton gyi pha rol tu phyin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par mi nu so/ nang stong pa nyid sgom par mi nus so// dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
156b1('bum): kyi bar du bsgom rtse bar mi so// dran pa nye bar bzhug pa rnams sgoms par mi nu so// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams dang / stongs rnams dang byang chub kyi
156b2('bum): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags bya'o ba lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom
156b3('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni/ chos thams cad dang rje su mthun po ste/ chos pa 'di chos grang rnams dang / rje su mthun pa lags she no// chos
156b4('bum): 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ rje su mu tro bri'o// chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa da/ 
156b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin du'i smai'i rol du phyin pa dang rjesu mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni nang skyong bu nyid dang / rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dngo slob mad pa'ongo ba nyi
156b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi Sh+Tha du rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar po zhag pa rnams dpe / rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni ya dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs dang / 
156b7('bum): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjesu mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gta/ 
156b8('bum): dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sboms sor 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rgyud dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa drung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med par
157a1('bum): smon pa med pa dang / rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni mngon par shes dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa/ 
157a2('bum): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad
157a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rje su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba dang 'du shes pa
157a4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la thog pa ma mchi sa/ skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la/ thogs pa ma mchi so// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa
157a5('bum): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchi so// 'phags pa'i badren pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
157a6('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mtsha par thogs pa ma mchis
157a7('bum): mo// mngon par shes pa rnams dang / tid nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
157a8('bum): pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchi so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis
157b1('bum): so// chos 'di dag ni na mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam pa nyid dang bre ba'i dbyis/ 
157b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang // / 
157b3('bum): rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa pa'i mtshan nyid do/ chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam sa/ 
157b4('bum): shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang nga/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyog/ 
157b5('bum): kyi chos sumo bcu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'pha gas pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gautan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang // 
157b6('bum): mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
157b7('bum): sgo rnam sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da/ mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po'i skye
157b8('bum): ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba che mchis so// chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa
158a1('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rten yang mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams
158a2('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bcu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang khasam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
158a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs
158a4('bum): pa dang mngon par shesra ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi bu sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang dbyam
158a5('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'i/ 
158a6('bum): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu rdzas kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rje su skyes
158a7('bum): so// de ci'i srid du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing smon to// mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa nyid rnams
158a8('bum): shing sngon do// de nis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'a
158b1('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dri ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyeso zhes zer ba ni/ ji ltar rjes skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin zhe na/ 
158b2('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gnyid kyi rje su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs pa dang / ma song ba de bzhin du gnas brtan rab
158b3('bum): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma song bas na/ thog ma nas gnas brnyan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi// 
158b4('bum): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid kyang de ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no// de/ 
158b5('bum): wAr na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lnga ba bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de
158b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sde su skyeso// ji ltar de bzhin ge shegs pa'o de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kya
158b7('bum): 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di bzhin nyid tsA la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyi la yang thogs pa
158b8('bum): med cing / de bzhin ga shegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bcig cing gnyi sa med de gnyisu byar med la nga bzhin
159a1('bum): nyid de yang ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med de/ de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin du ma gyur pa yang med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni// 
159a2('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas rten rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad
159a3('bum): du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brdan+da rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshes
159a4('bum): po'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa/ 'byed pa dem yin pa dmig su mod pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan ra/ 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa 'byed nga ni/ 
159a5('bum): yin pa dmigasu med pa ste/ de lhur na gnas rta na rAb 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i di bzhin nyid de/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
159a6('bum): nyid las gud ni yod pa ma yin te/ de nam yang de bzhin nyid mi yin zhing / rtag du de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa bzhin ma yin par de bzhin gshegs
159a7('bum): pa'i skyesu skyes pa kyang gar yang rjesu skyes pa med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas rngan rab 'byor ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so zhes bya ste/ 'dra
159a8('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// 
159b1('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis// 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// da ltar
159b2('bum): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid
159b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid do// de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
159b4('bum): nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
159b5('bum): nyid de la gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par rishes pa'i de bzhin/ nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gtse
159b6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do/ skye mched dang / 
159b7('bum): khams dang / rten cing 'brel bur 'byung ba'i rwa rab dang / 'du shes de bzhin nyidakyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rten cing 'brel
159b8('bum): bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyisu byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin
160a1('bum): nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du
160a2('bum): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
160a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // bsam gdan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
160a4('bum): bzhin nyid kyis/ shrI rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dri bzhi na nyid de/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyi su med de ga/ 
160a5('bum): byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na/ 
160a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin de la/ gnyisu med de gnyis byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
160a7('bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin de/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
160a8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyi su med de gnyisu byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
