250a2('bum): tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o// pha rol du phyin pa drug ni sgrom mo'i/ blo'o/ shes pa'o shes rab po// pha rol du phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyebaso// pha rol du phyin pa drug ni
250a3('bum): mgon no// pha rol du phyin pa drug ni mi'o// pha rol du phyin pa drug ni pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang sna
250a4('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'ab gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gdan nas dang / tshad med pa/ dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
250a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi sra mnas pa'i snyom ma pAr 'jug pa dgu drang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shA
250a6('bum): ba rnams dang / dang nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi/ 
250a7('bum): 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni lam mohAlam gyi rnam par shes
250a8('bum): pa nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// blo 'od shes pa'o// shes rab po/ lam gyi rnam par shes pani dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni skyab so// lam gyi
250b1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid ni mgron no// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni ma'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni pha'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i thams cad
250b2('bum): spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
250b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du 'gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ ma 'ongs/ 
250b4('bum): nga'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab drang yum du 'gyuraro// rabu
250b5('bum): 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig zhugs shing / 
250b6('bum): skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum tu gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco
250b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams de/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas
250b8('bum): kyi zhing yong su dag par 'dod pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongasu bsdu bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang tshig
251a1('bum): snyan pa dang don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas/ 'di skad du 'di ltar ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di/ 
251a2('bum): dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / mra dang pa dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / mgon yin no zhes brjod de/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems
251a3('bum): drapa' sems dpa' chen po bzhin gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams can gyi the tsom bcod par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang
251a4('bum): sems can yongasu smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la slob par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslabs
251a5('bum): par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags
251a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab byo ran mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med
251a7('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang yang med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis dri'i mtshan nyid des/ chos thams
251a8('bum): ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de so/ chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam drangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis babaka' stsol pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid
251b1('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams
251b2('bum): cad ni thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams can ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor rnam drangs des na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang
251b3('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des/ chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal ni chos thams da kyang chos thams cad kyis dben pa la// 
251b4('bum): chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis spong na// sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs po dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi kun nas nyon
251b5('bum): mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyuradaben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu/ dben pA sa ni stong / 
251b6('bum): pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs pa/ dben pa ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa de ni lta bu mi dmigs na bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag
251b7('bum): gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi bzhed pa bya ba la spyod dam/ gsol pa/ 
251b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de de leg so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags ste/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsol pa/ rab 'byor
252a1('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya bar dben zhing stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben no/ bde bar gshegs pa stong po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
252a2('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya bar sems can rnams kun du rgyug cing kun du 'khor bar 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa/ 
252a3('bum): de de ltar lag so/ bdag dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun du rgyug cing kun 'khor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun
252a4('bum): nas nyon mos pa yod pa yin to// gadra la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med de/ gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can kun du rgyug cing kun du 'khor ba med do// 
252a5('bum): de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/ rab 'byor de lta ra na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byung ba yod pa yin no// gso lwa pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
252a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa nisem gzugs la mi skyod detshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel/ 
252a7('bum): bar 'byung ba la mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gdan gyi pha rol
252a8('bum): du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyi bar la mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar ba nog pa dang yang dag par spong ba dang / 
252b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / 
252b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis mthar pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
252b3('bum): pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
252b4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi spyod/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod par 'gyur
252b5('bum): ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dra mig so bo comA ldan 'das de ltar spyod po'i byang chub sems dpa' sema'i dpa' chen po ni/ lU dang / mi da lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ma/ 
252b6('bum): thub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
252b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar ste ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mnon pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
252b8('bum): pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang mi bral ba ni zil gyis mi mnon pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa la
253a1('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thas cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa
253a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na de rab mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur la/ de dag nam 'tshe'i bar du zhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la
253a3('bum): zhig rim 'grol byur bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas mchod par byas de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
253a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de'i bson nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
253a5('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga ston pa dang / mchad pa dang / rnam par bzhog pa dang / rab tu bzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par
253a6('bum): 'byod pa dang / bsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par spyod pa na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor galade/ 
253a7('bum): stong gsum gyi chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas kyi bar gyi/ sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad phyi med par ma'i lus thob par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
253a8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur na/ de dag nas mtsho'i bang du zhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ sI sding dbye/ 
253b1('bum): mchong bar byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dge yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yeng su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bson sus/ 
253b2('bum): de'i rgyus meng du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa med do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal ma/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bri'am rigs kyi bu mo
253b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzhin la bston pa dang 'chad pa dang / rnam par bzhog pa dang / rab tu bzhog pa dang / 'brel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / bsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par smin pa
253b4('bum): dang // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod pa na/ de'i bsod nams ches ma du 'pho lo// rab 'byor gral de 'dzam bu gling gi seMs can gang ji snyed/ 
253b5('bum): pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigros kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gris dge bo bcu'i las kyi lamA li rab du dgod pa dang / bsan
253b6('bum): gdan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i skyes par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lhan cig cir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang khyir
253b7('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasmra pa'i byang chub la rab du dkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yad bla na med pa yang dag
253b8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab du dkod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu la
254a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mung du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
254a2('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin la ston pa dang / mchal pa dang / rnam par bzhog pa dang rab tu bzhog pa dang / 'bren
254a3('bum): ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag du ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
254a4('bum): gyi bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par 'gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba'i rtsa bcu'i lnga
254a5('bum): kyi lam la rab tu dkod pa dang / bsam rten zhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
254a6('bum): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu dkrod r+Na pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzi go sde pa'i byang chub la/ 
254a7('bum): rang du dkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yong su bsngos ma rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me dro'i rgyus ma
254a8('bum): du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang po/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
254b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzhin la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab du bzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par/ 
254b2('bum): ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'brel lo// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par
254b3('bum): 'byed pa na sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gan su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rdzogs par du byung / 
254b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
254b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bsad par 'gyur ba dang / 'dra bar lta ste/ de
254b6('bum): dge snying rje chen po thob bo// de dag rnam pa thams cad mi khye spyod pa des/ rnam par skyed pa'i dga' bos rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par
254b7('bum): sgrub pa'o// de dag mtshan ma dang ldan pa cig du mi gnas pa ste/ de dag ba dang snyoms chen po thob po/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dbu' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po
254b8('bum): ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// tshul khyams kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
255a1('bum): du phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs pa spangs ma rgyas kyang / sems can Sh+Ta/ 
255a2('bum): cad sbyin pa'i gan su 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir su
255a3('bum): gos/ bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi drung / yo byad la yong su spyod pa'i bting ba dang / sbyin dag gi sbyin pa dag por 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar
255a4('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po don yod pa'i khams kyi bsod snyoms kyi yongasu sbyar bar 'dod pa dang na sems can thams cad kyi lam snyan
255a5('bum): par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po'i byung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi gtsun ran gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongasu smral khor 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bla med pa'i
255a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha ral dri phan pa mig skyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rtag du rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par byo'o// gal te byang chub sems dpe' sem
255a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa drang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par spyod na yang / des yid la bya ba bzhin gyi go mi 'byed de/ de sA tsa nas kyang shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
255a8('bum): yid la bya ba nyid kyis mtshan nyid dri mi gang zhing de brtson 'grus la gnas pa de dag bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sngon tshod nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la nges
255b1('bum): dus bzhan zhig nA nor bu rin po che rnyed par 'gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che rnyed pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang yid bde ba dang / ldan par 'gyur ba las/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag du sngon
255b2('bum): drar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug sngal dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag du rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu mye de dang bral bar gyur to// zhes nor
255b3('bum): rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin pos 'di ni rin po che'ongasnyam du ba sams te/ rnam ma thams cad ma/ 
255b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor mar yang mi bya ste/ de ltar ni rdeg byed pa dang yid bde ba mang po dang lda
255b5('bum): par 'gyuraro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang gzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar na byang chub
255b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/ yid la bgyi/ 
255b7('bum): kha mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar chos thams cad
255b8('bum): ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'dzad de/ rnachos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / 
256a1('bum): chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid drang chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa ma yin sgon/ 
256a2('bum): bya bar shes pa ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ 
256a3('bum): ni rang bzhini dben rang bzhin stong pa ste/ de la 'phel ba med do// yongasu 'grib pa med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben par
256a4('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung ba ni de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
256a5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol
256a6('bum): phyin pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing 'phel lam/ yongs 'grib pa myed do// de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba'am/ yongasu 'grib pa med do// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am/ yong su 'grib pa med
256a7('bum): de// yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel lam yongasu 'griba'i med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin// rab 'byor gal de du srid du
256a8('bum): ngal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems mi 'jus rmi'i gong/ mi 'jigs mi snang srog par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshon po na phyir mi ldog pa'i
256b1('bum): dbyings la gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// zhes bya bar rtog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pade shes
256b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dum/ bcom
256b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod po'i chos gang yang/ 
256b4('bum): dmigasu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga bka' stsal pa/ rabya 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
256b5('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkaM/ stsal pa/ rab 'byor ro ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lpag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
256b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma la gsod bsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni/ 
256b7('bum): ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol
256b8('bum): byin pa la spyong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bci legs/ skye na ched dang / khams dang rjen cing 'byung ba shes ra kyi par
257a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma lag s+ho/ bcom ldan 'das bci lcags/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
257a2('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
257a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
257a4('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / deng nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
257a5('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
257a6('bum): 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'dra
257a7('bum): ci lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rig lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhan me yin
257a8('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab
257b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lpags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par/ 
257b2('bum): shes pa sdong pa nyid dang // gaslob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhin ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
257b3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyoni med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
257b4('bum): rab 'byor de ni mya yin no// gsol pa'i bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong po nyid dang gsog nyid dang / gsol nyid dang / rag lus pa
257b5('bum): nyid dpe snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de ba ni na nyid dang / ma nor ba de bani na nyid dang / bzhams yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dbu / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi sa
257b6('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
257b7('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'dus ci lags/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
257b8('bum): gdano dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med me'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa/ 
258a1('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi skye nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu h+nA mi 'jigasu pa dang / so so yang dag par/ 
258a2('bum): rig pa rnying byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du phyin stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid du
258a3('bum): gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid snying mo ma mchis pa nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / bzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / gachos kyi gnas nyid dang tshe/ 
258a4('bum): skyen med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings deng shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'odas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de/ 
258a5('bum): ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ btso ldan 'das gal te/ tshes de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lU mi spyod no// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen
258a6('bum): po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'phyir de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i chos de dang/ 
258a7('bum): khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol po bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
258a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos
259a1('bum): lang kas mthang ba'achas da dmags yang dmu gsalas bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
259a2('bum): chos gang mig su med pa skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lpag so// bcom ldan 'dres kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
259a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ rab 'byor
259a4('bum): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// rab 'byor 'di ni stobs
259a5('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chus ma 'dres ma'i lam zhes bya ste/ lA ma des zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' ste
259a6('bum): po de ltar spyod/ de ltar brtsol/ de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par mi 'gyur
259a7('bum): zhes bya ba'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag gi
259a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang yong su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad ni mi skye ba nyid gang
259b1('bum): gas sa rlu sa mas pa 'dzi po ma me pa la drug sugs sa sgru su sa
259b2('bum): no gra sol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang ma legs/ mi spyi ba yang ma lags pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' so so dpa' chen po/ 
259b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu lung bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin ni/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal de skye ba med pa lags/ mi skye ba
259b4('bum): yang ma lags pa las kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan nad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na bla na
259b5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du se sa/ gad bA nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
259b6('bum): byang chung du srung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 'ogs / bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa mang dag par
259b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rje sa ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya gang gis mngon par
259b8('bum): rdzogs par mi rid rgya da gang ngon pa'i rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya bar 'gyi bar de lta bu'i chos kyang gang gis yang dag pa rjes su ma mthong ngo // deci'i phyir zhen na ring 'byir nga na 'di lngar gyi/ 
260a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rnam
260a2('bum): par rmi rdog go// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag pa nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// / de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom/ 
260a3('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du zab po'o/ lta dka' ba'o// rtogs par dka' ba'o// rtog pa mo mchis pa'o// 
260a4('bum): sartag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// zhi zhing phra ba/ zhib pa'o// mkhas shing rig pas rtag par bgyi'o// bcom lda na 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ kle'u shi kA de de bzhin
260a5('bum): no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi mig ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po ni/ 'di snyam du bdag ni man+da par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mdi ni mngon par rdzogs
260a6('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes bya bar mi sems so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub pa/ 
260a7('bum): byed pa dang / dri bzhin du nan tsid+h+r-i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos bzhin gyi go mi 'byed/ 
260a8('bum): po de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 
260b1('bum): nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin du nan ngan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs sar sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ 
260b2('bum): sems dang sems las byung zhi ba'i chos bzhin gyi go mi byed pa de dag ni dge zla'i rtsa ba tha ma dad ldan pa yin no// ke'u shi ka de d+hI snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gang ji srid pa de dag
260b3('bum): thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par
260b4('bum): 'gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi dul la zhig kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing mched la/ klog cing kun chub par byed par 'gyur te/ bzungs zhing bcan
260b5('bum): ti klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du nan tan byed na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ sdong gi cha dang / rgya stong / 
260b6('bum): gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig rgyo phrag sdong gi bar gyi tshe dang / grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas dge slong gcig gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
260b7('bum): ces smras// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu klung gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ gAs mu gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dzug pa bzhi dang / 
260b8('bum): ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'changs/ 
261a1('bum): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid byed pa dang / de bzhin du nan ngan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs
261a2('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba bzhin gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis gnon tod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po bairgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di
261a3('bum): skad ces smra so// dge slong 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi las dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
261a4('bum): dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i seMs dang po
261a5('bum): skyed pas/ zil gyis mnon na/ gang shes rA kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun ngachub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung
261a6('bum): zhing bcangs te/ de bzhind nan tan du byed pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos de/ lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bam pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dris ni lnga
261a7('bum): dang mi dang lA ma yin du btsos pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan ci dra/ 'gro bar 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
261a8('bum): gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas
261b1('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas su ma zad de/ 
261b2('bum): byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la bas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
261b3('bum): pri dang bral ba/ de dag zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sos pa'i sems pa' chen po gang nisbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'i
261b4('bum): spyod pa dri thabs 'khas pa dang bral ba shesarab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral ba/ de dag kyang zil gyis man na ci po 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par yang / 
261b5('bum): mo zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo grang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs 'khras po dang bral ba
261b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis min ni bcing 'gro bar 'gyur// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa'
261b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po doni byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la khasra pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag
261b8('bum): kyang zil gyis mnon cing 'gro bar 'gyu ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo spyad par mi zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
262a1('bum): po gang bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs 'khas pa dang ma bral ba/ gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis mnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gdan la
262a2('bum): spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa
262a3('bum): 'jog rten zil gyis mnon par mi nuso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji skad du ldan pa
262a4('bum): dang / mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi 'ochad pa 'i don du gnas ngo'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems da/ 
262a5('bum): chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed de/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snying po byang chub 'phreng bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
262a6('bum): semams dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa la slob pa ste/ nyan tho/ 
262a7('bum): kyi slad pa slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi slab bla slob pa ma yin no zhes/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub skyes dpa'i drung dpa' chen po'i drung du/ rgyal po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar sems de/ nye bar dang / 
262a8('bum): zhing 'di skad ces smraso// kye skyes bu chen po myur du slebs shig/ skyes bu chen po sbyin ming par spobs shig/ lhung bzod dpa na po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chuba'i 'dug sde bla na me nga/ 
262b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ste/ 'di dag ni bla dog gyi de bzhin gshegasu pA dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyis
262b2('bum): bA zhes pa'o// zhes zer zhing sten to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i
262b3('bum): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong par sems/ de'i drung du bdag kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro ba ri sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe mA'i lha'i bu nas
262b4('bum): dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lnga'i rgyal po de rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro ba ra sidz+dza
262b5('bum): so// lha'i dbang po dbang bsgyur yang bzhin 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// tshangs pa mi 'ched kyi bdag po yod tshangs rnyis kyi lha'i bu rnams
262b6('bum): dang rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang nye bar dong bar sems// dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che bu dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin
262b7('bum): du mthong ba dang / phyi rlom sdang babu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'deng bar sems/ byang chub sems dpa' tsha sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab rab kyi pha rol
262b8('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rdeg du dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang / 
263a1('bum): 'dril de ltar spyod pa 'di'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug stsal brnyan gyis maskrod da byas pa gang da cig sus la 'byung ba dag kyang / tham cang du rnams
263a2('bum): la'abyung mi 'brub pa ste dge slong drini byangachu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mi du byin pa thab mi 'dil skyong ba'i mi// 'dzin mon dan 'byung ba ts+tsho/ 'dus pa'i na nams gang ji ste
263a3('bum): pa 'di lta ste/ mig gi ning dam/ mig nga'i rnying dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang
263a4('bum): chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po shwa rab kyi ral tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la skyed pa'i tshe 'di'i yon dan du rig pa bya'o// shes ra
263a5('bum): bam pa / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di rang
263a6('bum): gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs par brjod dam/ 'on de sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
263a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyis rtog pa sems kyis yongasu shes/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa dang shes rab
263a8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan dang / legs par brjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo nga
263b1('bum): de bzhin no// de de bzhin de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i yon tan dang / legs par brjod pa de ni de bzhin
263b2('bum): gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlab so// dga'o gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro
263b3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/ grang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed bcig yod pa de
263b4('bum): dag thams cad ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas ded rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
263b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par gyur ram/ 'on de ma yin gyis bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya
263b6('bum): bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bzhin yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe// 
263b7('bum): bdud sdig to can zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig de can ci nos kyang byang chub
263b8('bum): ses tha'i chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed po las/ sems gcig tsam 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang shus par 'gyur ba dang / spug yid par 'gyur bar bskar mo spong / 
264a1('bum): par gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' so
264a2('bum): dpa' chen po thams kyi drung du sdig do can rdzo ba'i das su pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems de chen po thams cad kyi rgyu
264a3('bum): dru dud sdig to can gartsi ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba yin no// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dag ni
264a4('bum): bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi sngon gyi mthar/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bskrun pa'i tshe/ sems mo byas par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig do n+dan
264a5('bum): dag brtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dag bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem gang shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha ril du phyin pa
264a6('bum): yin nam/ 'on dam ma yin zhes the tsom du 'gyur ba de dag gi drung du sdig to can brtse bar byasam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dge'i bu bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang
264a7('bum): bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so// ma thos pas mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar sgom pa ma shes pas
264a8('bum): de bzhin du nan dan mi byed de/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de yang sdig ti can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar
264b1('bum): dam pa'i chos ma yin par yongasu 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang / sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyu ro// dga' bo bzhin yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
264b2('bum): bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la sngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i sngags pa smra ba ni/ bdag gi grogs yin
264b3('bum): te/ gang dam pa'i chos 'di yin pa'i sngags pa smra ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thig pa pa'i dzim mang po'i nang nas bdag gi drogasu rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
264b4('bum): bya ba 'di/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnus par 'gyur ba de ni/ bdag gi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam sde/ dga'
264b5('bum): bo byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to / can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyuraro// dga'o bzhin yang byang chub sems dpA ji lta bu la bdud kyi klags rnyed par 'gyur ba zhe na/ byang
264b6('bum): chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi se rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shin du zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di
264b7('bum): thos pas ci zhig bya/ sgoms pa dang bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / kun chub par bya bas kyang ci zhig byed ngas kyang de dag gi rting ma rnyed ni khyod kyis lha rnyed ro skan zhes zer na dga'o bya
264b8('bum): chub sems dpa' de la yang sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyuraro// dga'o bzhin yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhin yang / byang chub sems dpa
265a1('bum): brnyas pa snyed cing / da ni sbyin pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
265a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/ khyod ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gdan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
265a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sem su byed na/ dga'o byang chub sems dpa' de yang sdig to can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur// draga'o bzhin yang tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdes
265a4('bum): nyid mchog tu rloms su byed na/ dgra'o de'i tshe/ bdud sdig te can dga' ba dang spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' pa drang tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur de/ dga'o
265a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' ba bzhin gang gis byang chub seMsadapa'i ming brjod pa 'am/ ru sa brjod pa kun du grags
265a6('bum): par 'gyur na/ de'i ming brjod pa'ame rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhin dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du bsod cing / bdag la stod bzhin smad la/ 
265a7('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag dang / de la med par rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas
265a8('bum): byed pa de dag gis nyon mongs skyed cing / bdag stod bzhin smod/ de la 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar
265b1('bum): khyed byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa lnga rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo // zhes de lta de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg/ 
265b2('bum): dI pA daM dag la mi snyan par brjed cing skyed na// de la bdud sdig do con 'di snyam sde/ bdag gi gnas ni sbrengs par mi 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol sing gi skye gnas dang / 
265b3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi dang / yi dgas kyi yul shin du 'phel bar 'gyuraro// zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig zung du rung bar 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar bdud sdig tu can byang chub sems dpa'
265b4('bum): de byin gyis rlabs te/ de'i tshig zung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bar sems te// de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis
265b5('bum): thos sam/ mthong na mthun par spyod cing / de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin du slob ste/ de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'i nyon mongs pa shin du 'bol bar 'gyur de/ de ltar de dag
265b6('bum): bsam gtan pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi lus gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid mi skyeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems
265b7('bum): tsan+da dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin du/ 
265b8('bum): 'phel bar gyur pas/ dga'o don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag/ 
266a1('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / brtson ci drung ni mchog du gyur pa yin gyi khyod ni ma yin no// zhes zer na/ dril bdud sdig do can 'di snyam du sem sa tad/ rigs kyi bu 'dri n+ti
266a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ de ci'i phyir
266a3('bum): zhe na 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru dang di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gyi skye gnas kyi
266a4('bum): lam mo// de ni shin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no// snyam du sde par 'gyur ro// dga' bo bzhin yang gang zag byang
266a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub se su dpa'i theg bA pa nI bzhin du thab cing rtsod na/ 'khrug bya med cing 'chang 'brun/ de la sdig to can 'di snum du
266a6('bum): sems 'bri gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgya / 
266a7('bum): bI'i phyi ran na/ rigs kyi bu 'dri gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyim ma 'iniH/ rigs kyi bu gnas kyis ni sems can dmyal bu dang / rgyal so/ 
266a8('bum): gi skyoganas dang ga shin ji rje 'jig rten gyisam rgyam sa// nas nas dga' zhing slo dang/ tshig zhing 'di bde bskye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo bo zhan mngag la de byang chub sems dpa' myi
266b1('bum): ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa la gnod par ses shing / 'thab cing brtsod la 'tshang 'brub na/ gal de/ des rnam pa thams du mkhyen pa nyid yongasu mi bdang zhe na/ 
266b2('bum): du sdi ga pa'i soms skyed pa dang 'thab cing rtsod pa dang 'khrug cing 'tshang 'gru bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi skal ba gi cha bge bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gi so/ 
266b3('bum): sems skyed pa de dag la 'byung ba bzhin ma mchis sam/ 'on de ma lags kyis/ bskal ba de snyed kho nar ge cha 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga'o gang zag nyan thos kyi theg
266b4('bum): pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bya rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcangs pa'i chos stan te/ dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa
266b5('bum): theg pa pad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag 'thab cing brtsod la/ gshi zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thab cing brtsod de/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par byas nas// 
266b6('bum): phyir mi 'chags par 'dud par 'dzin cing / khon du bzung ste gnas na de dga' gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su mi gtod
266b7('bum): zhe na/ gdon mi za bar skal ba de nyid du go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing brtson dag shi ba dang / mi snyan par brjon par gyur na yang / 
266b8('bum): bdud par mi 'dzin phyin cad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis thob par bya banyis pa thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal btsam dgos na/ dwe ltar bdag sbas pa dpe phyir smras
267a1('bum): pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya/ rgod na/ de ltar bdag bzhin la mi snyanA pa smra zhing daphyir rtogs pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis bdag
267a2('bum): gris glen pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par
267a3('bum): rdzogs bsangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las zla bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan semasasu byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa'i tshul ma yin gyisad bdag gis de dag la gnod
267a4('bum): sem su mi byed do// bdag gis de dag la 'khru gaM par mi bya'o// snyamA na dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud
267a5('bum): sdig tu can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang klags mi rnyed do// dgra'o bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen glo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pA pu dge
267a6('bum): dang 'grogs par mi bya'o// de dag dang lha cig tu gnas par mi bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te'o dug na yang dris su la yang gnon semasu mi bya'o// 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir
267a7('bum): na/ gang bdag gis 'di ltar bdag gi la gnod sems bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de dag ni bdag la ma tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267a8('bum): ba'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas do// sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu bgrol bar bya bar dag go snyam mo// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
267b1('bum): pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// bam mo// / dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267b2('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgra'o 'di lta sde dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin
267b3('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par gnas bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'dri ltar bdag gi drogs te glu gcig tu zhugs
267b4('bum): nga'o/ 'dis ji ltar slab pa bzhin du bdagagis kyang slabs par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang
267b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam/ gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs
267b6('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / gsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthor byis gnos pa'i snyoms/ 
267b7('bum): par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzi
267b8('bum): ping ni som ma dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gadzel bsdi bar bya'o// 
268a1('bum): de nyid la bdug gis kyang bslab par bya'o// skems skyed do// de sku bzhin yang sems 'di ltar skyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
268a2('bum): ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bral bar 'gyur na/ de la bdag gis slab par bya'o// ga lang byang chub sems
268a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed
268a4('bum): do// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po ni slob pa mnyam po yin// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las
268a5('bum): le'u bzhi bcu drag pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'dras la 'di skad ces gsol do// bcom ldan 'dra
268a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po monyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyiseb ka/ 
268a7('bum): stsol pa/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid
268a8('bum): do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na/ 
268b1('bum): po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / skye mched dang / 
268b2('bum): khams dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung bso stong ngo / rten cing 'brel pas stong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
268b3('bum): chos rnams kyis spong / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gdan dang batshad med pa gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis mnus pa'i snyoms par 'jug
268b4('bum): ba ni/ mthar gyis mnas pa'i smos par 'jug pas stong / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gsheg
268b5('bum): pra'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / seM so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
268b6('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa nyid// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
268b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268b8('bum): chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i bar du sleb na/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
269a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar ba'i slad
269a2('bum): du slob na// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam po thams cad mkhyen bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad/ 
269a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes
269a4('bum): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skye mched dang / khrims dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas/ 
269a5('bum): bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ pha rol du phyin
269a6('bum): pa thams cad dang de stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdod dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gdan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
269a7('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / 'thor gyis na nos pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin pa/ 
269a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs dang / so so yang dag pa'i rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu rgyang bas par bgyi ba dang 'dod/ 
269b1('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / sI skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
269b2('bum): du bas par bgying pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bigye ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po lags/ 
269b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bka rab 'byor de nI ma yin+ti daM/ garta nas brtan rab 'byor gang 'di skad tu/ gzugs zed par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
269b4('bum): pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dbya ba'i phyir slo ban rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ 
269b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tsher ba dang du 'du shes dang / 'du byed
269b6('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya'i phyir sleb na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob ni/ rnam pa thams cing
269b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rna
269b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched dang // khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang
270a1('bum): mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
270a2('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gu tan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med po'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang du rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas hUM
270a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang // 
270a4('bum): ma 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad zad par bya ba dang // 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang / mi skye
270a5('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nem pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bur
270a6('bum): bya ba dang bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang mi skye bar bya'i phyir slob ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ zhes smras pa de ni mi yin no// rab 'byor de ji snyam du seMs
270a7('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel ba'i de bzhin/ 
270a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa dadu/ 
270b1('bum): gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gdan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi/ 
270b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis mnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med dang / smon pa med pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
270b3('bum): mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gling yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa
270b4('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi so ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang
270b5('bum): ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mu lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
270b6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dra pa' sems dpa' chen po ni dri bzhin nyid la slob sbed rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ de bzhin pa nyid ni zad pa 'am/ sla
270b7('bum): pa'am/ skye ba 'amo 'gag par 'gyur ba med de la 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de bzhin nyid la slob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
270b8('bum): la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhan
271a1('bum): pa rnams la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang du byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phyags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 
271a2('bum): slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin/ bsam gdan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
271a3('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la spyod pa yin/ ri
271a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa'i bA dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bcwa brgyad la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad
271a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid khyi bar la slob pa smon rab 'byor de ltar skye bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pi nA slob pa/ thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba
271a6('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'i chen po ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha nas kyis pham par mi nus pa min/ 'di 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chu seMs
271a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nini bdag gi pha med bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod/ 
271a8('bum): yul la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgon du gyur pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub so sa
271b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing moH/ 
271b2('bum): su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ldan
271b3('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du skor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob pa yini/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
271b4('bum): ses pa' sems dpa' chen po ni de sems can thams cad spongasu smin pa'i bya ba'i phyir/ slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de lta ro/ slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
271b5('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yino// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni mchi ba med pa'i sgo 'byed par bya'o// / 
271b6('bum): zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o// zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor sems can dmyal bas ni slobs
271b7('bum): pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob de ni/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las 'don par 'dod s+ho/ rab 'byor de lta
271b8('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dmyal bar mi skye'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten du skye'o// 'tha' kho ba dang // cing rong can du mi
272a1('bum): skye'o// phyag dang khrod pa dang / rdo pa'i rig su mi skye'o// zhur bar mi 'gyur/ skyur por mi 'gyur ro// zha bor mi 'gyur/ yan lag skyon can du mi 'bru'o/ 'on/ 
272a2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa med par mi 'gyuro// dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur// dbang po yongasu tshang zhingang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyuraro// srog cod par mi 'gyur ro// ma byin pa len/ 
272a3('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yeng ba dang / brdzun du skye ba dang / phra ma can dang / zhe bcod pa dang / tshig bla can dang / chags sems can dang / gnod sems can dang / phra ma
272a4('bum): can dang / log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro// log pa'i tshe bas 'tshe bar mi 'gyuraro// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongasu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can tu mi 'gyur ro// tshul
272a5('bum): khrims ngan pa yongasu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lAn ring po'i nang du mi skye'o// dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs 'khru
272a6('bum): ba dang / ldan pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' semasad pa' chen po// lha tshe ringos por mi skye ba'i thabs labs pa dri lta bu de la yod de/ de la gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi/ 
272a7('bum): pra pi du phyin pa 'di nyid laso thabs lakhas pa bsnun pa ste/ thabs 'khas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan rnams la yang dag ru 'jug che
272a8('bum): med pa ni mas sa yang dag par 'jug/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang dgi smos par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par/ 
272b1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i dri
272b2('bum): ma yongasu dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongasu dag par thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
272b3('bum): yongs dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi yongasu dge ba thob par 'gyur lcags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
272b4('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa snyed rab 'byor de ltar chos
272b5('bum): thams cad medang su dgu pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can zhum pa med cing 'gong ba med pa de ni/ rab
272b6('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye'o thams cad kyis chos nyid mi shes mi mthong bas// sems can du dag gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
272b7('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam brta
272b8('bum): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba la spyod/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rdas
273a1('bum): la spyod/ yang dag par slong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / de stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod
273a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod/ rnam pa thar pa brgyad dang / mthur gyis mnus pa'i snyoms/ 
273a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga spyod/ de bzhin gsheg
273a4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba
273a5('bum): la spyod de/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi spobs dang / mi 'jigs pa du du thob par 'gyur de/ 1
273a6('bum): zos dang sangasu rgyas kyi sar mi ltung du/ rab byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nr-i/ sems can thams cad kyi sems spyod pa dang gas
273a7('bum): ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na/ 'dzam bu chu/ klung gi gser gyi le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo ngo/ ra
273a8('bum): 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slob pa 'dil slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang cu snod sems can gang nani thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
273b1('bum): kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can 'gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa'i las yang dag par blangs de
273b2('bum): gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ sems can gang gyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba yin/ las yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa de lta bu'i sa mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sos can gang rnam pa thas
273b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa'i la ma 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung sto sems can gang nyams kyi rgyal na thos kyi sa 'am rlung sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur
273b4('bum): ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab 'byor bzhan yang byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de
273b5('bum): dag pas ni dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan ngan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo // des pas kyang sems can gling ni ni thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
273b6('bum): rgyas kyi sa laru gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang // rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa'ichen hUM theg bya ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi
273b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad cing the tsom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon po de dag pas nr-i/ glang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa mnon par 'gyur ba dri lta bu che sna mang ngo / rab 'byor de byas
273b8('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i ser chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ma
274a1('bum): 'di nyid la slob par bya'o// / rab 'byor bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ser sna dang ldan/ 
274a2('bum): pa'i byang sems skye 'od tu 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i bya sems mi skye'o// lo lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// g.yeng ba'i dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// shes rab 'chal ba dang ldan na/ 
274a3('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o// zhe sdang dang / gang mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tha dad ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
274a4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / 
274a5('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'phag pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan da / tshad med pa dang / 
274a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis mnaste bu'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
274a7('bum): dpe mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sre so yang rig par rig/ 
274a8('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i byang chul sems/ mi skye'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab/ 
274b1('bum): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems can dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinu pa zab/ mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang dmigs pa med de ma dmigs pas/ chos
274b2('bum): gang la yang skyo ba med do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pa rol du phyin pa thams cad yongasu 'dzin
274b3('bum): par 'gyu ro// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang mthun por spyod par 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi da
274b4('bum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dor pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de 'jig tshogs su lA bar lto ba'i rnam pa drug bcu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang
274b5('bum): 'dus po yin te// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dperan/ skyes bu dus
274b6('bum): byas pa 'gyur ba'i mtsho bo'i dbang po'agags pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/ 
274b7('bum): zab me 'od lta spyod pas pha rol du phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems tse dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bro pha rol
274b8('bum): du phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin po 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mi 'di lta spyod pas bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa
275a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyur pa la slob pa yin no// rab 'byor sa chab kyi ma rum dbyed pa zab ma la byas pa par
275a2('bum): stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed pa 'khor pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
275a3('bum): 'das 'dzem bu gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang mdzu ba lags nas sdeng gsum khams kyi sems can lnga smos kyang / 
275a4('bum): ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi lus
275a5('bum): thob par 'gyur de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin ga gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang sku tshe mthar phyin
275a6('bum): gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems cad dpa' chen pos rgyun mchod par/ ni bza' dang / snyoms dang dub zims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos snyen bkur byas ni/ 
275a7('bum): rab 'byor de dzi snyam du sems naH/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posna de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'brel lam/ gastsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar ga sheg
275a8('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal ba/ rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang daklog ci
275b1('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegasab tu nan tan byed na/ de'i bsod nams de'i mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub seMs dang / sa
